1.content:
It's one of the hottest 4th of Julys on record. Mrs. Sandra Jones is resting after spending most of the morning preparing the food for the celebration later in the day. She is on a lawn chair dressed in a small top with short shorts. Her long and lean body is tanning in the sun as usual. Sweat forms in small pools on her rock hard stomach. Sandra is a woman very concerned with her appearance. Every inch of her body is well kept from her shining white teeth down to her french manicured toe nails.

She glances towards the other side of her large backyard to watch her children and smiles to herself. Her children mean the world to her. They're the only people she loves more than herself and would never dream of hurting them, even though she is known for her considerable temper especially around small insect pests. She drifts off to sleep.
1.title: Mrs. Jones and me

11.content:
Across the backyard the three Jones children, Jon, Megan, and little Blake are having their little adventure. An imaginary one. Jon swings a stick around, pretending its a machete, cutting down the fantasy jungle foliage. Megan fans herself with a paper plate and lets out a bored sigh. She is riding on top of Blake who is pretending he is an elephant carrying the would be adventureer's supplies.

Megan lets out another sigh. "Whats wrong Meg?" says Jon looking back at his bored sister. "Ah nothing, I'm just getting tired of playing the same games over and over and looking at the same stupid backyard."

Jon frowns and says to Megan, "Well the rest of the family will be here soon, so we'll have other kids to play with. And make sure you wear that old ring Aunt Jane gave you, it's supposed to be magic".

Megan glances down at her ring. She hadn't worn it since her aunt Jane gave it to her last year. It was old and needed polishing, and the tiny jewel encrusted in the center had a dull appearance to it. "Well I wish this magic ring would give us a real adventure" says Megan, when suddenly the jewel in the ring begins to glow from a dull red to a bright crimson. As it just so happens, the key to using the ring was to speak the words "I wish this magic ring would..." and thus the real adventure for the Jones siblings begins
11.title: The young adventurers

choices: Jon stuggles off the weed, escapes with his siblings
one down, two kids to go
111.content:
The ring on Megan's hand flashes and in an instant the three children seem to disappear into thin air. Mrs. Jones stirs out of her slumber for a moment. She takes off her sunglasses and rubs her eyes. She could've sworn she saw a large red flash just a moment ago. It must have been someone accidentally setting off a firework early. There's no sign of her precious children anywhere. Sandra frowns and gets out of her chair to walk over where the children were playing...

Meanwhile young Jon is recovering from the effects of the ring. He feels sick and a violent swaying motion isn't helping things. He is suspended what he guesses is about twenty feet in the air. Below him he sees his brother and sister are passed out on the ground. He looks around himself to get his bearings. He's surrounded by a sea of light green plants and below are several boulders. He looks up to see his shirt caught on a branch attached to an oddly shaped tree. Nothing is making any sense to Jon he feels as if he wants to cry but his tears are held back when a deep rumbling moves across the earth. Then another, and another, when finally a french manicured foot explodes with a BOOM onto the earth close by. The foot is enormous, the size of two buses placed side by side. It is smooth and tan but moves with a deadly power and force that betrays its feminine quality.

Jon looks up to see what this harbinger of doom is attached to. His vision makes its way up a long and tan leg that streches for at least two to three miles until it reaches a pair of shorts. The shorts give way to a flat and toned stomach and stops at two mountain sized breasts. Further up is the face of this monolith but the sun blinds Jon for a moment. He squints and is finally able to see the face of his titanic mother, seemingly staring right back at him. It's all just too much, Jon finally vomits.

Sandra reaches the spot where the children were playing but all she sees is the stick Jon was using and one of those pesky weeds that always grows this time of year. She looks at it in disgust, she hated little annoying things that were smaller than her. She lifts up her foot and...
111.title: A reason to get sick

choices: Jon wakes up his siblings, they form a plan
1111.content:
Jon wipes his mouth and shakes his head, trying to pull himself together. He looks back up to see his mother's face twisted into a mask of absolute disgust. He had never seen such a look before, at least not from this perspective. Yet he knew somewhere in the back of his child brain that this look meant his ultimate destruction if he didn't take action.

Jon struggles with all his might to free himself from the weed. His shirt begins to tear as he tries to grab hold of the weed and slide down its base. He finally tears free and gets in position when he feels the earth tremble. The giant tan foot of his mother is slowly lifting off the ground. Jon knows he doesn't have much time. He slides down the weed, creating cuts and scratches all over his body. He yells out in pain as he slides but he knows he cannot slow down. He lands on the rough dirt with a thump and falls backwards.

He looks up to see his mother's leg raised, her knee level to her stomach. He can see hundreds of wrinkles in the sole of her foot and in those wrinkles are tons of dirt and blades of grass. Jon gets up and begins to run preparing himself for the inevitable. He sees his brother and sister and dives for them. The foot obliterates the weed and impacts the ground with an earth shaking BOOM! Waves of dirt and dust are forced into the air creating a small cloud around it.

Jon rubs the dust out of his eyes, it was close. The foot is only 30 of his feet away from him and his siblings. He quickly moves and grabs both of them by their arms and begins to drag them into the nearby blades of grass. "I've got to wake them up and think of a plan" Jon says to himself.

Meanwhile, Sandra looks at the destroyed weed and smiles. The children must have gone to a friend's house for a swim, she thinks to herself. Sandra hears a noise behind her. It's her husband Gary with one of their relatives.
1111.title: Better move fast kid

choices: let's search for the ring by ourselves
let's try and ask a relative to find it
11111.content:
While Sandra greets her new guest, Jon runs to his brother and sister to wake them. He goes to Megan first and begins to shake her awake. Megan slowly opens her eyes and stares up at her panicked brother. "J-Jon? What is it? Why were you shaking me?" Jon doesn't answer but instead quickly runs over to Blake. Megan watches Jon trying to wake their brother. She looks up and sees her colossal mother standing over her. She screams putting both her hands on either side of her face. She suddenly notices that the magic glowing ring is no longer on her finger.

Unbeknownst to Megan, when the ring had granted her wish the energy that was generated flung it off her finger somewhere into the yard.

Megan walks over to Jon and explains that the ring is missing. Jon helps Blake up and everything begins to fall in place for him. The ring. It would be the only way to return to normal. Jon explains they have to find it, even if it means contacting a relative to do so.
11111.title: One ring to shrink them

111111.content:
Jon looks at his siblings with a look of determination on his face. "Guys, we've got to get that magic ring back, it's our only chance for returning normal". Blake begins to cry, realizing what a seeminlgy impossible task is being put before him and his family. He tugs at Jon's sleeve and says "Jon, I don't wanna look for a stupid ring, I wanna find mama". Jon rubs his little brothers head to comfort him. "I'm sorry little guy but mom doesn't know what's happened to us and even if she saw us she may think we're bugs. I almost just got squished a couple of minutes ago. We need to find that ring before the rest of the family comes, otherwise we'll be dodging dozens of giant feet in this jungle yard."

Blake nods in understanding and wipes the tears from his eys. Jon finds a twig and breaks it into walking sticks for them all. They can hear the rumblings above from their mother and other relatives. They need to hurry.
111111.title: comforting Blake

choices: They make it to the table without incident
1111111.content:
It was not an ideal situation, but then, few usually were, and he had read enough books to know that things were going to get worse before they started getting better. But he also knew they would get better. After all, he was the leader of this group. He had to not just think they would survive. He had to know they would, to keep his siblings from panicking. Sighing at this he shook his head, slapped his face and pointed.

"We first have to find where the ring is. That means we need height, and right now that table dad setup last night with Uncle Bobbie's help is our best bet," he told Megan and Blake, his finger indicating the direction of the object. The two younger siblings, seeing the look on his face, brightened a bit, his confidence, as he'd hoped, being an infectious thing, causing them to start believing they would get out of this situation.

Inside his own head though, he admitted that it was unlikely they would succeed. In point of fact, it all depended on if the ring had shrunk with them. If it had...well they were doomed. They would never find it in the backyard, and even if they did, it's power might have shrunk with it. If it were still big though they would be able to see it from the top of the table, and then it would be just a matter of reaching it, while dodging relatives all focused on playing with explosives.

Above them one of those relatives is just starting to settle in, his hands full of various things for this little get together, including buns, that were both wheat, white, and some that advertised as having butter baked into them. The last he wasn't so sure about, but it was what his aunt's list, and he liked Aunt Sandra, for the most part. Behind him Uncle Gary brought a bag of charcoal, setting it down beside the grill.

"Heh, so, when's this girlfriend of your's going to get here?" asked Gary as he set about scooping some coal into the barbeque. Sandra, who had heard nothing of this looked over at Oliver, or rather Ollie to everyone he knew, her 6'5" Basketball playing nephew and smiled.

"Oh Jasmine will be here in a few minutes. I left her at the store. She was going to pick up some more stuff for the party," he told her, and Sandra sauntered over to him, looking him up and down in a judging way that set Ollie to scratching the back of his head and smiling nervously.

"So, where'd you meet this Jasmine, and what's she like?" asked the aunt, and Ollie started on a diatribe about meeting her in one of his engineering courses at school. It turned out she already knew Jon, which was one of the reasons he hadn't told his aunt about her, as she knew Jasmine too, as Jon's teacher's aide at school, whom she had met that time Ollie had helped the little prankster fill the school's sprinkler system with a type of foam that smelled like chocolate. They got in trouble for that one, but it was one hell of a prank.

On the ground level the three younger kids were unable to understand their massive relatives thanks to the disproportion of their sizes. Still they knew they had to hurry as the sound of three voices filled the air, and more would follow close behind. They knew they could probably just hide somewhere and wait for the party to get over, and then try to get to the table, but their mother's hatred of small things would work against them there, as the yard was fumigated nightly by some high tech sprinkler thing to keep bugs and little creep crawlies away.

That meant people didn't look down, and they wouldn't have to deal with any arthropods themselves(A fancy word for bugs Jon learned from a science fiction book), but it also meant they had to find the ring today, and that they wold have to deal with unaware giants stomping around all over the place, and could probably crush them without even noticing it. Depressing as that thought was the trio press onward into the tangle of grass and dirt before them.
1111111.title: A Destination In Hand

choices: They are able to stay on the table leg
They still fall, despite this precaution
11111111.content:
Oddly enough the journey to the table takes less time than Jon would have expected. It probably had something to do with one of those things in the books his mother read him about star ships and things. Maybe because their mass was less than it should have been, they were able to proportionately do things better than they would have at normal size. Like an ant lifting ten times its own weight or the like, but in this case making their steps easier, and allowing them to make a steady pace along the lawn, which, underneath a thin layer of topsoil, was mostly plastic, another defense against bugs.

"Okay, we're here. Now what?" asked Megan as she stared up at the monolithic structure before them. It seemed to reach off into space from their height, though Jon knew it was only three and a half feet off the ground. He'd been the one holding the tape measure for his uncle and father when they'd been selecting which leg to put on it after one had gotten busted.

"Well, the leg in the corner toward the pool had this twisty design in it, cause dad broke the one that actually went with the table by bending it in half. The one there now came from that table mom bought for the pool. We should be able to get up that one with ease," he told his siblings, pointing toward what he was talking about, before walking toward it.

All in all, their journey, of proportionately two miles, took the kids only twenty minutes. In that time the only thing their cousin and parents had achieved was that the grill was on a low heat, buns for burgers, hotdogs, and even just sandwich bread with lunch meats and cheese, were laid out on the table, and the pool was covered, the last being one of those automatic things that moved at a touch of a button and was sturdy enough to walk on.

"Come on guys," said Jon, looking over at the distant shapes of the titans that he knew were his family, his dad twisting together the fuses of some of the professional grade fireworks that Ollie had asked Jasmine to make, her degree being chemical engineering. According to her they would blow any of those store bought things that anyone else brought out of the water.

"So, are you going to introduce me or what?" asked Jasmine as she entered the backyard, a smile on her face as she walked over toward the table, tossing a few odds and ends, including paper plates and plastic cups, onto it, before finally approaching Ollie, who twirled her in his arms and then kissed her, while the plastic table shook from the impact, forcing the still climbing children to grab onto each other, lest they fall.
11111111.title: A New Arrival Makes Trouble

choices: went over to the table to make a snack.
111111111.content:
When the earthquakes begin to subside Jon moves himself forward cautiously. The edge had looked so far away when they had started up the twisting path of the table leg, like one of those giant spiral stairs in the old castles. It had seemed much smaller though in those minutes as everything shook violently from side to side. Sighing in relief as he leaned back he laughed to himself, smiling confidently back at Megan and Blake before leading them upward and onward once more.

It was less than a minute later when they were just below the level of the table, and to their fortune the leg, designed for a table with an overhanging edge, literally went right up to the top of the table it was attached to now, allowing them to get onto it with only a few moments of difficulty where Jon hoisted his siblings up, an then had them help him to join them.

Standing there, having conquered something higher to them than any mountain, the kids were feeling good about themselves as they looked down on the ground, desperately searching for the glint of light that would tell them where the ring had fallen. Their gazes at last found it, but unfortunately for them, their sights were not the only ones that fell on it as Jasmine, just breaking her kiss with Ollie, looked down and spotted it at her feet.

"Oh my, what's this?" she asked, picking up the ring, only to find that Ollie had turned back toward his uncle, who needed help setting up the last firework, and his aunt, a woman she had met more times than she'd liked, was inside, getting some more snack food for the party ready. Sighing, the 6'3", red-blonde haired college girl looked at her prize, and then, with a smile, slipped it on her finger, where it miraculously fit her perfectly. Thinking it was the aunt's, she decided to keep it until the end of the party.

Meanwhile the kids looked over at her, and started yelling immediately. Their initial plan of finding the ring themselves had gone out the window now, thanks to Jasmine finding it, they had to get her attention. And they had to do it before the party was over and those sprinklers rained liquid death on them too. Shouting and yelling they waved their arms as Jasmine slipped the ring onto her finger and then.....
111111111.title: The Ring Rediscovered

1111111111.content: Jon tells them to stay there while he goes over towards Jasmine to get her help, unfortunately when he begins to climbe her sleves the wind picks up and Jon falls off. Jon then landed in a glass of water and luckily he did not get hurt. However, he didn't feel to safe being inside a beverage while at a party. WHAT HAPPENS???

11111111111.content: Sandra approaches the table with her revealing her sweaty abs as they glisening and as she rubs them due to hunger. She gets a plate full of snacks and grabs the glass of water Jon is currently floating in. she sits down in her lawn chair and places her plate ontop of her belly and the glass of water between her legs. She begins to eat and soon there isn't any food left on the plate. She then places the plate on the ground and reaches for the glass of water with Jon inside. Jon begin to fear the approaching lips and before he knows it he's fighting the pulling current toward Sandra's mouth. It's no use, he enters her dark mount and rubs past her tongue. With a loud gulp Jon is sent down her gullet. Sandra finishes her water and pats her sexy belly with content as she drifts off to sleep. Mean while Jon begins to pound on her stomach walls Jon simply hears her rubing her belly in an attempt to calm her belly down. Sandra thinks she just has a little belly ach from her recent meal and begins to fall asleep while Jon awaits digestion.
11111111111.title: Inside Sandra's Belly

111111111111.content:
Ollie sees Sandra wince a little and pat her belly, so he goes over to her.
"What's up, Aunt Sandra?"
"Well, I just got a little bellyache is all. Something in there doesn't quite agree with me."
"Why don't you have some more burgers--that heavy stuff'll settle it all down."
"Well, maybe yer right. Oough..." Sandra lets out an uncomfortable *bllurp* and moves down to the grill.

The other kids see all this, and quickly hide in the warm burger that Sandra is looking at. Sure enough, she picks it up and presses it to her wrinkly, made-up lips. Megan and Blake rush and jump into her mouth, eager to reunite with their brother, or at least die with him.

Outside, Sandra eats the burger slowly and uncomfortably--she's already stuffed with hot dogs & such and her belly begins to feel strained. Halfway through the burger, she swallows the meat she was chewing and feeling something dry & grainy against the back of her throat...Wincing, she just swallows harder, forcing it all down inside her tummy. Her stomach gurgles ominously, but after another swig of water and the rest of that burger, Sandra's gut feels a little more settled. She sighs contendedly and goes back to the deck chair to sit down.

"Ahhh...Nothing like stuffing yourself on a pretty summer day."
She leans back. Her now slightly bloated stomach has pushed aside her clothes, revealing a cute bellybutton with a few little blond hairs around it.


=====


Inside Sandra, there is chaos. Disgusting globs of bread and meat, with chemical cheese spattered everywhere, churn and grind against each other as the ribbed, slimy walls rhythmically squeeze and relax, squeeze and relax, trying to make this sticky, not-quite-wet-enough masticated mess into a thinner kind of soup so it can be digested smoothly. The kids struggle to reunite, finally finding a quiet space, at the bottom of the stomach, just next to a certain conspicuous tightly knotted pink puckered valve.

"What do we do now?" asks Blake.
"Well, now that we're all together," began Jon, "I think if we all beat on the walls of her stomach, our combined strength with force her to throw up."
"That won't be pretty," commented Megan, noting the huge churning mess before them.
"But it's our only choice. Let's go. You go over there, Blake, and I'll go up....Megan! No! That's the--"

Megan had begun beating on that puckered sphincter at the bottom of the stomach that looked like somebody's anus. She looked around in surprise, but it was too late. The stomach contracted, and everything--EVERYTHING, digested or not, was pushed very awkwarkly into poor Sandra's duodenum.

=========

"Ah-, my word..." Sandra complained as a long, low gurgle emitted from somewhere deep inside her. There was a distinct, almost painfully full slithering sensation inside her, and she no longer felt nauseous, but the heavy, dense mush inside of her now felt as though it had traveled quickly into her intestines. "What did Gary put into those burgers...oooh!" She stroked the swollen lump in her abdomen, hoping to ease the intense, mushy pressure that she felt inside of her.
111111111111.title: Megan Makes a Mistake

1111111111111.content:
The Kids see that the Walls of the Stomach contracting and pressing all the way to the duodenum.Blake let a scream out "Heeeeellll....",but then the mass of half digest Food swallow him and he follows with a "Slurrrrrpppp" his sister.Jon try to Hold on the slippery Ground,but no chance.He struggle to avoid get the Way down,the Big Load of Burger behind him,let him no other Place,so he get pressed also into the tight hole.

At least nearly all Food ,(with 3 extra special Nutriments),are down.The Stomach is nearly clean like a fresh swept Room.The Walls are coming Back,waiting for new Work.The Mix of Food and Children get now slowly transported further...

First Megan have really trouble with breathing,because the first Part of the Food was nearly Digest,and so she was surrounded,by a Slimy Soup,like she have to Eat, when she was a Toddler."Bähhh !" Megan shouting out,"that´s not very tasty...wähhh !!".She looks around.But no Blake or Jon visible."Blaaaaake !! ...Jooonnnnnnnnnn !! ".....

No Answer...


Some Tears rolling over here sweet Face....
1111111111111.title: Down it´s go .....

choices: Sandra masturbates more to encourage intestinal contractions
11111111111111.content:
Aunt Sandra, after weathering the initial embarassing gurgles and movements pulsing deep in her abdomen, began to feel a little better. So she relaxed in the lawn chair for a bit and began to read her summer book.

But just as she'd reached the third chapter, there was a tiny, tiny little crafwling sensation, low down within her. She'd never quiet felt that before--except one time when, as a teenager, she'd swallowed a june bug whole on a dare and felt its tiny legs exploring her for two days--and Aunt Sandra didn't like that senation, although it did have that forbidden, slightly sexy aspect of having some alien being deep within you.

"It's probaby just an intestinal muscle spasm," she thought to herself. But then...a long, low grown from below her bellybutton, and a just barely painful pulling and streching feeling as her intestines worked hard to push along the copious loads of hardly-digested hamburger meat currently filling Sandra's gut. She regretted eating so many, and said so, putting a slightly wrinkled hand to her now somewhat swollen belly.

Finally she decided that she had to excuse herself from the party for a while. Sandra retired to her room, and lay down on her bed. She removed her tight-fitting clothes, as they only cramped her intestine. She put a hand to her peach-fuzzed bellybutton and moaned in pleasure as she felt the mushy contents inside her loosen up and begin to flow just a little easier. The feeling was so good, she reached down to her very wrinkly, fuzzy brown vulva and teased the wettening lips there.

"Ahhh..." Sandra felt relief, and closed her made-up eyes in pleasure. She lay there listening to the gurgles for a minute, feeling the pain subside somewhat. Sandra ventured a finger into her sticky vulval folds, coming closer to satisfying another urge that had gone long unfulfilled.

She thought of an option, to help ease her digestion and reach the big, heavy bathroom trip she was already looking forward to.
11111111111111.title: Sandra finds a little relief.

111111111111111.content: Sandra walks into the bathroom and reaches for the laxative under the sink. Without hesitation, she chugs amount half of the bottle's contents down her throat. She sighed with relief as she finished guzzling the laxative. With a familiar growl from her lower abdomen along with the feeling of the digested burgers in her intestines beginning to loosen, she smiled at the fact that she would soon expel the excess food from her body.
111111111111111.title: Sandra takes a laxative

choices: Hitch a ride on a fly
Descend to the floor and approach Sandras feet
Grab on to a passing giant and drop onto Sandra
111111111112.content:
"Oh my god! Meg! Mom just drank Jon!", screamed Blake, grabbing his sister by the arms and shaking her.

"I know i saw i saw!! We... we need to get him out of there! Blake... we need to go inside mom and get him."

Blake looks at his sister in slackjawed bewilderment.

"Are you crazy!? What can we do to help him?!"

"Let me think.", Megan says.

Megan scans the table top for something to help them in their endeavour. She highlights three items that could prove useful.

A piece of lettuce they could rip and fashion into a megaphone and call for help once they are close to an ear.

A discarded net that was used to keep the lamb roast in shape was left on the table. Meg believes that they can tear a few threads from the coil and use it as rope for steep situations.

And finally a pile of toothpicks rested on a white napkin. They could be used to fashion a white flag to hopefully be used to catch someones eye. But being to big to lift, they would not make good weapons. She would have to use splinters off the wooden pick.

Meg sends Blake to tear a piece off a lettuce leaf and Meg builds the white flag by ripping a piece off the napkin and tieing it around a toothpick. The colossal relatives continue about their socialising, completely oblivious to their younger members scrambling for their attention. Blake finally comes back with lettuce and Megan meets him with both their rope and flag completed. Meg coils the rope over her shoulder and secures the flag in it.

"We really going to go in there?", Blake asks, stepping to the edge of the table and pointing at their giant mothers bare tanned belly, still relaxing on the chair.

"We have no choice. Jon is toast if we dont."

With that, Meg and Blake..
111111111112.title: Extraction mission-Operation Tummy trouble

choices: They make it to her mouth
The fly gets knocked out of the sky
1111111111121.content:
Meg and Blake decided to descend onto the floor and climb their mother from there. But suddenly, a small fruit fly landed in front of them. It was the size of a miniature pony compared to them!

"Meg! Get away from that thing!", cried Blake.

Meg shushed him, then approached the fly slowly with her hand outstretched toward its face. Meg really did not want to touch the fly, but if she could tame it, then it would be a quick ride up to her moms mouth. The fly stared down Meg as she stepped closer and closer, until she finally placed her hand on the fuzzy bridge of the flies... nose? The fly didnt react, so she took it as acceptance. Meg mounted the fly then tested to see if she could fly it. She flew around with it for awhile then zoomed down towards Blake and snagged him up when she felt she got the hang of it.

"Omigooood!!! Watch out! Whoooop!!! Look out for that hand! Whoa! Wow!"

Meg directed the fly toward their lounging mother. She had removed her shirt at this point to reveal her bikini top underneath, and had reclined the lounge chair to work on her tan, while a couple of her friends and her sister talked around her. The fly dodged and weaved up, over and around passing giants as Meg directed it towards Sandra. They were fast aproaching her when...

They arrived in front of their mothers slightly open mouth. Her breathing washed over them like burger scented waves and her inhales hindered the flys position as her breath drew it in closer before blowing it away. The kids could see inside and came up with a plan to get their brother out.

Eventually, Sandra swallows and emptys the contents her mouth down her esophagus. Meg and Blake hop off the fly aand land on Sandras warm, moist, squishy tongue. Meg decides to tie the rope around...

choices: They find Jim and create an escape plan
1111111111121112.content:
Megan and Blake screamed as the landslide of salad, saliva and who knows what else carried them back down Sandra's throat. "Blake what do we do?" Megan screamed.

Knowing that the string dangling from their mother's tooth was their only chance, Blake desperately tried to grab it. With Megan's arms wrapped around his torso, Blake managed to get a single hand on their rope. Their relief was short lived, as the saliva had made it just too slippery for him to hang on.

Blake could only watch tragically and scream as he and his sister fell down their mother's thirst intonthe abyss.

Sandra let out a quiet cough, as she could feel something irritating her throat. She did not think too much of it, and never would have guessed her children were causing that discomfort.

Upon entry into the bubbling chamber that was their mom's stomach, Megan and Blake landed with a.splash. "What do we do now?" asked Blake.

"We find Jon and get out of here," Megan responded.

Though neither knew exactly how they would do that, they did know it was their only choice. They began calling out for Jon in the blackness.
1111111111121112.title: No one grabbed the rope

choices: It’s the kids making a stand.
11111111111211123.content:
Sandra quickly adjusted her position into a more upright one, something felt very strange in her chest, like out of the blue something alive was trying to fight against her internal workings. Emma held her 4 younger cousins in the palm of her hand, but she couldn't care less at the moment. Her mind was solely on the thought of a magic ring, one capable of changing people's sizes. What frustrated Emma was that the ring was currently in the possession of her younger cousin Lauren, someone who didn't seem deserving of such a cool and powerful object.

Emma smiled, she thought she had formulated a plan to get that ring. "So you said Lauren has the ring that will fix you guys?" she said, faking being worried. Her giant eyes observed the tiny kids trying to say something, most likely agreeing with her.

"And she doesn't know that Blake, Megan and Jon are shrunk too?" Again, the same response from the kids.

"Well then we have to get her to change you guys back," she said. Emma walked out from behind the shed and spottted Lauren texting by a tree. "Heyblauren can you come back here for a second?"

Lauren froze. She already had a pretty good idea as to what this was about. Obviously Emma somehow found out about Isabel.

Walking behind the shed, Emma proceeded to call out Lauren. "So funny thing, after you shrunk Isabel," she said as Lauren's face went white. "After you shrunk Isabel, I found her, as well as a few other people. Look familiar?" Emma asked lifting her palm up to Lauren's face.

Lauren couldn't believe it. Within her older cousins manicured hand were her sister Isabel, who she knew would be there, but also it looked like her cousins Blake, Jon and Megan. "What happened to you three?"

"Well they shrunk obviously," Emma said in an annoyed tone. "How about you make grow them back?"

Lauren sighed. It had been fun while it lasted. "I wish those 4 were back to normal." Just like that, Isabel, Blake, Jon and Megan returned to their normal sized. They hugged for a few seconds and talked amongst themselves, though Emma was not really paying attention. Everything seemed to be back to normal, though Isabel had now lost her invincibility.

Emma was still focused on getting that ring. Behind the shed, it was just the six of them, with the rest of the relatives oblivious on the patio. Emma decided to try to persuade them. "So Lauren, why don't you let me hold on to the ring?"

Lauren paused again. There was something in her cousins voice that wasn't sitting right with her. "Ummmm, it's okay Emma, I'll keep it for now."

Emma just gave her a smug smile. "Lauren, give me the ring."

Lauren just paused and looked at her 4 younger cousins. They also seemed to not know what to do.

"If you don't give it to me, I'll tell aunt Sandra and aunt Jane what you kids were doing," Emma said, knowing the kids would be terrified of getting punished. "Imagine the trouble you'll be in," she said ominously.

There was another pause before Isabel said, "Lauren I don't want to get in trouble for this. We'll be grounded forever."

"I'll tell you what we're gonna do," said Jon, taking the lead. "We're gonna get out of here and get to the ring, then we'll grow back to normal."

His siblings and cousins liked the idea, but it just did not seem possible with their giantess of a cousin seemingly going to block their attempts.

Jon paused, making sure everyone was still following him. "Megan, you and me are gonna pretend we're going for the ring. Emma will probably do something with us, but I don't know what."

Megan appeared nervous at this, but hesitantly agreed.

Jon continued. "After Emma grabs us, Isabel and Blake you run to her leg, try to draw her attention that way. Then Lauren you get to the ring and grow us back."

There was silence as everyone seemed concerned about the mission, but realized it was their only chance. "Alright, let's do this," Lauren said, waiting in the pocket.

The children began their plan and it worked like a charm. Jon and Megan ran out of the pocket and were instantly plucked up by Emma. "WHAT DO YOU THINK YOU'RE DOING?" she asked, trying her hardest to intimidate them.

Megan liked Olivia allot. She was older than Megan and her brothers (22 years of age) and had grown up mainly with her cousins Ollie and Sam. Ollie's brother Sam was now 25 and had just gotten married. Megan was hoping desperately to return to normal size so that she could meet Sam's new wife.

Ollie decided to take a closer look. He bent down and pressed head to the floor, his eyes started searched under the mini-fridge. Sure enough, right before his eyes was that funny little bug. He lifted up the mini-fridge with one hand and used the other to casually scoop up the bug.


Megan stopped and began panting for breath. She'd made it under the mini-fridge and she felt she was safe for the moment. She gave a little jump, when she saw the twin mountains descend to the ground with two almighty earthquakes. She began to tremble, they were Ollie's knees!

Megan's trembling turned to all out shaking when Ollie's huge face appeared in front of her, his eyes locked directly on her. The fridge she was hiding beneath gave a jolt as huge redwood sized fingers lifted it far up into the air.

Meanwhile, Aunt Sandra was out in the backyard greeting guests when she noticed something shiny in the grass. She bent down and picked up the ring. "Now why the hell would the kids just leave this laying in the grass, " she said while putting it on. She thought she heard a voice calling for her and noticed her favorite nephew Ollie motioning for her to come over there.

"Hey Ollie what's up?"

"I found something you might be interested in," Ollie said with a smile, holding the squirming Megan between two fingers. "I was gonna crush it but then I thought, 'nah, Aunt Sandra will have way more fun'," he said laughing.

"Ewwww, I hate bugs, but I'd be more than happy to dispose of it," Aunt Sandra said with an evil smile. "Care to watch?"

Megan, meanwhile, was terrified in her mother's hand. She was screaming with all her energy to try to get her mom to notice her. She looked over at her mom's other hand and noticed the ring. "Mom! Please it's me! The ring shrunk me, you have to use the ring." Obviously her screaming had no avail as her mother put her on her bedroom floor and closed the door. Ollie was watching as Sandra put her gorgeous bare foot next to the tiny bug.

"Ollie, come kneel down next to it. I'll give you a better view," laughed Sandra.

Ollie got down on the ground next to the bug close enough to see it running for its life. All he did was laugh.

Aunt Sandra then lowered her gigantic manicured foot on top of the insect and pinned it to the ground. "Ooh, I can feel it squirming."

All Ollie could do was smile, as he was getting very excited to be honest. "That bug sure is lucky, do die under your beautiful toes like that."

"Awww thank you Ollie," Sandra said. "But it won't be so lucky now." Sandra then re-positioned her foot so that her big toe was now covering Megan. Megan screamed but it was too late, as her mom's giant toes crushed her tiny body into pulp.

"Wow," Ollie said.

Aunt Sandra laughed. "Is that how you wish you went out, Ollie?"

What happens next?

Sandra bit her lip in anticipation. Though she hated bugs, even she was curious about the idea of having a tiny person in the palm of her hand. "Do it sweetie, I'll take care of you," she said, her voice quivering with excitement.

Her big toe was like the size of a small house compared to him now. As Aunt Sandra took her first step with a tiny nephew between her toes, Ollie realized the perils of this ordeal. Along the way, grass shavings were constantly blowing up in Ollie's face, yet he managed to stay on the sandal.

After 5 minutes of searching, Sandra spotted the ring lying in the backyard. Crouching down to pick it up, she also took the opportunity to check in on her tiny nephew. He thought it was about time to return to normal size, especially since he noticed that his girlfriend Jasmine had now shown up to the party.

111121211221111221312.content:
Ollie stared at the insects that Sandra was about to crush. Suddenly, he realized what they were.

“WAIT STOP!” Ollie yelled, panicked. Sandra had her foot just above the trip, frozen. Jasmine fainted at the sight of how close it got.

“What is it?” Sandra asked, confused.

“Pick up those bugs, I don’t think they’re actually bugs.” Ollie said, calmed down a little, but still pretty panicked. Sandra moved her foot away from the three, making sure not to harm them. She knelt down and carefully picked up each one and set them in the palm of her hand. Though she had an urge to squash them, she had an idea of what Ollie was trying to tell her, though it confused her because she felt there was more than there should be.

As she lifted them up, Ollie slid down Sandra’s shoulder and ran onto her hand.

“Is it her?” Sandra asked, leaning in close to hear.

“Yes, and you’re not going to believe who is with her. Your sons!” Ollie said happily.

Sandra quickly wished that they were all normal sized. Before they explained anything though, Jon took the ring from his mother.

“I wish that Megan was standing next to us, normal sized and completely alive and well.” Jon whispered, causing a bright light to appear. Sandra flinched when she saw her daughter suddenly appear, just waking up.

“Uhg, where am I? What happened?” She asked.

Once Jasmine woke up, everyone traded their stories on what had happened. Sandra couldn’t believe that she had killed her daughter (Megan was able to remember being crushed but she had no memories between that moment and the one where she woke up alive). She knew it wasn’t entirely her fault though since she had no idea who she was at the time.

Jasmine was a bit upset at the joke that was played on her, but since she was alive and unharmed (plus her boyfriend saved her from being crushed earlier), her anger eventually turned into curiosity for the ring. Megan grabbed the ring and looked at it.

“So, what are we going to do with it? Should we have some more fun being tiny?” Megan asked. The question caught everyone off guard since she was the one who actually died before.

“Aren’t you scared of being crushed? Who knows you may even be devoured and digested!” Jon said.

“I agree completely, I don’t want to lose you.” Sandra said, swiping the ring.

“We’ll hold on. Yes I’m a little nervous, I could easily die, and maybe I will, but think about it this way. This ring can give us an adventure, one that few humans have experienced. Besides, as long as one of us stays normal, they can just wish us back alive and safe, just like how you saved me.” Megan said, confident. Without the 100% danger situation, perhaps it could be a bit of fun. As everyone looked at her, they couldn’t argue. They just needed to keep an eye on the ring since it kept wanting to fly away.

“You know, I did kind of like being small.” Ollie said. Jasmine wrapped her arms around him.

“As long as I’m with Ollie, I suppose I’m fine with it too.” Jasmine added. Sandra looked at her children. The thought of them being crushed or eaten was terrifying. However, she had no argument she could throw it other than they were just kids, and they wouldn’t listen to that.

“I suppose I’m fine with it too. We need to decide how to signal each other though. After all, I almost crushed you.” Sandra said. Ollie smiled though.

“Easy, we’ll give everyone a cell phone. You do have extras, do you?” Ollie asked. Sandra nodded, she had a enough for everyone. They had originally been emergency phones for if they went camping, but they would work here as well.

Once everyone had a phone, they needed to decide who who stay normal sized. After a minute, the group voted for…

Sandra was very surprised when they chose her. After all, she crushed her daughter, scared Jasmine away before, loved crushing bugs a lot, and almost stepped on Jasmine, Blake and Jon. However, she decided to trust their decision. She held the ring and looked at them.

“I wish you all shrunk like before.” She said. A bright light appeared quickly consuming the others. Sandra knelt down and picked them all up. Jasmine held Ollie, though she sounded pretty confident before, the sight of a female titan still made her a little uncomfortable.

Even though the smart idea probably was to tell everyone at the barbecue that there was a ring that could shrink people, everyone had silently thought of the same idea: it wouldn’t be as much fun if everyone knew about it. The fact that some people might see them as insects is actually part of the reason why this was an adventure. Sandra stepped outside with everyone in one hand and a phone calling Megan in the other.

“Ok, just decide where you want me to put you.” She said. Megan discussed it with everyone and finally decided…
1111212112211112213121.title: A giant mother, with the shrinkies in hand

11112121122111122131211.content:
The tiny explorers decided they wanted to check out the food. Sandra set them on the middle of the table and looked around to see if anyone was watching. Once she saw they were in the clear, she finished up the phone call with Megan.

“Now remember, call me if you get into trouble and keep the phone on in case I get too worried. I’ll use the ring if I can’t get a hold of you.” Sandra said before hanging up. Once Megan put her phone away, she turned to the others.

“Ok everyone, let’s look around.” She said.

There was lots of food. There was different kinds of chips, hamburgers, hotdogs, chicken, and other good food. Though the gang had seen obviously seen food like this before, seeing it at a new size felt different.

“Hey how long do you think it would take me to eat this entire burger?” Ollie asked his girlfriend. She simply giggled.

“Maybe a few days, if you didn’t get sick from it. Come on, follow me.” Jasmine said, climbing on top of it. Ollie smiled and followed onto the burger with her. The couple sat down on it. “It feels comfortable. With the right wishes, perhaps everyone can be happy.” Jasmine said, placing her hand on the meat. Ollie put his hand on hers.

“Someday my love, but for now, let’s just enjoy ourselves.” Ollie couldn’t help himself and climbed on Jasmine, starting to kiss her. Jasmine wrapped her arms around him and started to kiss him back.

Meanwhile, Jon and Blake were exploring a bowl of chili. They had gotten a bit hungry, and the chili was starting to look good. Blake was starting to lean it, smelling it.

“Careful, you might end up as part of the meal.” Jon warned. He had realized that the power of the ring made them arrogant to their surroundings, though he wasn’t sure how to convince the others of that.

“It’ll be fine. Let’s just grab a quick taste and get out.” Blake said, starting to climb in. Jon sighed, he was a bit hungry. Jon looked around to see that there weren’t any giants close(even though he knew they could appear any second). The shrunken boy took another sigh and climbed in with his brother to join the feast.

Megan was basically alone on another part of the table. She was staring at a can of soda, looking at her reflection. Though she wasn’t as afraid of dying as she was before, the though of her mother stepping on her kept playing in her mind. How her foot surrounded her, how she died almost instantly. Though she had a phone with her, she still knew she could very easily die… to anyone. Her father. Her mother. Her friends. All could end her in a moment. Though, it didn’t entirely scare her. Rather, it interested her a little. She was no longer seeing life as a human, she was seeing it like a bug. Everyday bugs experience this, and now she was able to see their perspective of it.

Megan sighed and put her hand on the reflection. She truly had no memory of the afterlife. She didn’t know if that was a good thing or bad thing. One thing she kept thinking though was if she really was going to get killed like a bug again, how would she die, and by who? If she had to choose, she kind of hoped it would be her dad.

As the three groups got distracted by their activities, someone was approaching the table, hungry. Everyone was so distracted, they didn’t see who was approaching. Whoever it was though, they were going for…
11112121122111122131211.title: A new look on food

"So what do you wanna do, my love," Jasmine whispered in Ollie's ear, giving his butt a playful squeeze.

Ollie looked at her, wrapped his arms around her waste and gave her a kiss. "I've got an idea," he whispered, pulling off his shirt. He whipped off his belt and shorts, and smiled as he was Jasmine begin to strip down as well.

What the shrunken, lovemaking couple did not realize, was that dinner time was about to start. Sandra was unaware of their shrunken whereabouts, only knowing that they were somewhere on the table. This would spare them from an awkward explanation, as Sandra probably wouldn't like them having sex on people's food. However, this also meant that they were a greater danger of being eaten.

The bug sized couple were completely naked, their tiny clothes laying around the party like miniature ingredients. Who was eating the burger?

Sandra had gone and laid down on a chair, trying to relax. She just needed to believe in her shrunken family. This adventure is what they wanted, and they had some insurance (the ring) if things got bad. However, after a few minutes of trying to relax, she just couldn’t stop thinking about it. She had thought about calling them just like she said, however, she really didn’t want them to think that she had no faith in them.

“I need something to eat.” Sandra finally said, getting up. She walked back over to the table. She looked closely, her family was here so she needed to be extra careful. She spotted her daughter over by a soda can, and her two boys in the chili, enjoying themselves. She thought about telling them to get out because it was too dangerous, that’s what a mother would do. Sandra couldn’t help but notice they were smiling and having fun, and it made her smile. Dinner was starting soon, so a lot of people would be hungry. They were pretty close to the edge of the bowl though, so they were probably safe enough.

Sandra didn’t see Ollie and Jasmine though. No matter where she looked, they were nowhere to be found. However, what the giantess did see was a nice juicy burger. As Sandra picked it up, her belly started to rumble. The burger did look good, but she still didn’t know where Ollie and his girlfriend were.

“…No. They wouldn’t climb inside the burger. They’d have to want to be dinner to do that, and I don’t think Jasmine would allow that.” Sandra said to herself. Ultimately, her hunger won her over. She took a large bite and enjoyed the taste.

After she bit down and tore some of the burger away, the shrunken couple became visible to her line of sight. Unfortunately for Ollie and Jasmine though, Sandra hadn’t noticed them yet.

“No! I don’t want to end up as food! Not like this!” Jasmine yelled. She and Ollie screamed, trying to get Sandra’s attention. They may get in trouble for putting themselves in a dangerous situation like this, but Sandra wouldn’t intentionally eat them… right?

He looked back over his shoulder to see her glistening lips enveloping a building sized mass of meat and bread. “Phew lucky we got out of that jaz” he said confidently as he started to get to his feet. “Jaz.....?” He scanned around in panic, he was sure she’d been with him, “Jaz!!!!” his heart sank at the realisation he was alone “JASMINE!!’” he shouted as he span around on the spot, hoping she’d suddenly just appear, it was only when the loud “mmmmmmmm” emitted from the giant face looming above that he realised the horror of the situation.

Before he had much chance to do anything, one of his conclusions was seemingly wrong. The burger slapped hard against the plastic surface of the plate sending Ollies tiny body flying across the glossy white surface. It took him a solid minute to work out what had happened and where he actually was. When he did eventually get to his feet, he found himself looking up at his aunties athletic figure from her lap. This was a much more pleasant angle to see her from and he desperately tried not view his humongous relative as the breathtakingly attractive woman she was, but as the living prison housing his equally as attractive girlfriend. He needed a new plan and fast!

“Hang on baby” he shouted toward the inclined bronzing tummy directly in front of him.
