She saw her sister typically sprawled out across a sun chair, making sure everyone got a good eyeful if her well toned body, barley covered by her minuscule bikini. Jane scoffed at her siblings muscular frame, she was certainly not in bad shape herself, just didn’t go quite to the extremes Sandra did to maintain her athletic looks. Granted her bum and tummy may not be as firm, but she had a few years on Sandra and she still felt as confident in a bikini as her sister. “Well at least I got the better sense of humour” she thought to herself as she walked towards the table, eager to prove that fact to her perfect sisters kids at least.

Stopping just before reaching the well stocked buffet-playground her niece and nephews currently occupied, She brought what was left of her burger and it’s tiny inhabitants back to within range of tiny ears.

Ollie and jaz’s tiny naked forms held each other for balance as their platform ascended at speed towards the giant womans face. She warmly smiled approvingly at the two miniature figures hug. Jaz, who to Ollies surprise had taken everything shockingly well so far, gave a cheerful, yet nervous smile back to her boyfriends colossal mother. Jane then spoke up with energy and excitement “ok you two, I have an idea for the best prank ever, I may even be able to trick my sister with this one too.” She then motioned deliberate awkwardness with gritted teeth, “however it does mean you’re both going to have to um, be my mouth.... for a bit.”

Neither Ollie or Jaz said anything straight away. Ollie was in disbelief at the words coming out of the very location in question, they had only just escaped a horrific death in mothers jaws, and now she was going to intentionally put you back within its destructive power, she’d literally just lectured them on how horrible being digested would be.

Before Ollie could respond with the obvious objections, Jaz spoke up curiously “will we be safe in there? I mean what if, you know? Ollies look of incredulity now switched to Jaz, how could she be so casual about this? Was she actually ok with being literally in his mothers body because he definitely wasn’t.

Before any of his questions could even be asked, his mothers voice spoke out again “trust me sweetie, I’m going to keep you two nice and safe under my tongue throughout the whole thing, You both will be fine! Can you imagine everyone’s faces when they think you two have actually been eaten?”

Ollie didn’t really have any chance to react from then on, just Jasmines lack of resistance alone was enough for Jane to proceed with her plan and had already continued her journey to the table. Ollie thought maybe Jaz was just trying to impress her potential future mother in law, but something gave him the impression she was actually enjoying this.
1111212112211112213121112322.title: Jane pretends to eat the kids

choices: Swallows, it’s all part of the plan.
11112121122111122131211123222.content:
Megan remained troubled by her experiences. Still focused on her own reflection, she was certainly not seeing the enjoyment in the situation her brothers were, she could hear their happy laughter from somewhere in the chilli bowl.

Suddenly a dark shadow encroached over the entire table, followed by a familiar sweet voice humming. Megan smiled with relief, she now wanted out of this giant world and her mom had returned to help her. She turned to see a solid wall of bare torso towering over her. Before she could process anything her tiny legs were already in motion towards the safety of her mothers presence. something was wrong with this belly though, its skin was way too pale, and instead of her moms defined muscles, a small tummy pouch extruded over the table slightly. She came to an abrupt stop just millimetres away from the giant figure, she knew it belonged to her auntie and once again she was in the horrifying presence of an unaware giant, so close she could smell her coconut sun cream.

Despite the fact Jane clearly had a handful of burger left, she definitely seemed to be eyeing the table for something particular, Megan decided it was time to call mom, before her brothers ended up eaten. Reaching for her phone she could swear she could hear her name being called. She scanned around, the table was clear, she went back to her phone, then she heard it again but louder “MEGAN!!” Her heart sank, she looked up to see her cousin and his girlfriend sat naked on Janes last bit of burger.

Megan furiously waved back, trying to warn them of the danger they were in, it however became quickly apparent they were warning her of the giant woman slowly leaning her body over the table, and she was seconds away from being squashed be her aunties tummy. Megan turned and ran as fast as her legs could take her, but the wall of flesh was catching her fast. She could feel the heat coming off Janes body as it started to engulf her world. She dived forwards in a last hope of getting clear. As she hit the hard surface of the table, her phone bounced clear of her hands, she then closed her eyes waiting for the inevitable again. She felt a pressure growing over her legs, then to her surprise stop at her waist. Megan cried with relief, her momentum had stopped just in time. Her aunts stomach had her completely pinned to the table, but she was alive.

Jon and Blake were having too much fun to notice their colossal relative seductively leaning over their current bowl, grinning to herself like that cat that got the cream. When she did actually speak, the playful voice instantly got their attention “waw this chili looks almost delicious as this burger, it must have some kind of ‘extra’ ingredients in it... I bet this chilli does too.. let me just finish this last bite then I can make a start on this”. Jane then taunted the last bite of burger in front of them, so close it actually seemed deliberate. Both boys got a good view of the naked couple sat on top of it, and both instantly reacted by trying to flag down their giant auntie.

Even if Jane wasn’t pretending not to see them, it wouldn’t of helped, she couldn’t hear them, all her attention had switched to her meal. She slowly raised her burger remanence to her waiting lips, the lower of which she bit in anticipation, eventually the glossy gates slowly parted and a pink tongue came out to greet it, she carefully positioned the bite into the middle of it, and cautiously retracted it, engulfing it in one.

Traumatic as it was for the tiny audience to witness, something about her actions seemed very theatrical, and kind of ‘sexual’. Jon even looked around to see if Jane was trying to seduce someone across the table. Also she didn’t really seem to be chewing, just manoeuvring her mouthful around her cheeks with her tongue.

After a lot of internal prodding and poking, Jane...
11112121122111122131211123222.title: Jump to Megan, Jon and Blake’s POV

111121211221111221312111232221.content:
Jon and Blake looked onward and upward in horror. Their Aunt Jane had just swallowed the remainder of her burger, totally unaware that her own son and his girlfriend were a part of it. In the chili, Jon looked over at Blake who had tears in his eyes. "She's gonna eat us too," he cried.

Jon tried to comfort Blake but he could not even think of anything to say. Truth be told, he thought Blake was right.

In reality, Jane had managed to swallow that last bite of burger, all while keeping Ollie and Jasmine safe and underneath her tongue. They were well hidden there, and could not be seen whenever Jane opened her mouth.

"This is so weird," Jasmine said, as she was hit in the face with a wave of Jane's saliva.

Ollie shook his head, still having a hard time processing where he was. "Never thought I'd end up here," he said with a laugh. He still could not believe they got caught naked, having sex on his mother's hamburger.

In the outside world, the other three siblings were in a panic. Jon and Blake had now been scooped up and were currently in Sandra's bowl of chili. Meanwhile, the bug-sized Megan was still stuck to a small fat roll on Jane's stomach.

Glancing down, Jane smiled, knowing she had Jon and Blake trapped, though she had no idea where Megan was. "This chili looks amazing," she said, her mouth watering.

With a grin, Jane decided to try and scare....
111121211221111221312111232221.title: Swallows, it’s all part of the plan.

111121211221111221312112.content:
Though Jon knew being in a bowl of chili wasn’t a good idea, he kept following Blake. What he didn’t realize was just how far in he was following him. Blake was too distracted by the taste to care what was going to happen. Once they were pretty close to the middle, a shadow suddenly loomed over them. Jon looked up and panicked.

“Blake! Forget the food, we have to get out of here!” Jon yelled, shaking his brother. Jon couldn’t see who the shadow belonged to, but their presence scared him. Blake was too busy to realize what he meant though.

Just as Jon feared, he and Blake were suddenly scooped up into a bowl. The shrunken boy shook his brother harder, causing him to look up and finally see the giant.

“OH NO! SWIM AWAY!” Blake yelled. He and Jon tried to get to the edge, though Jon felt like it was already too late, almost forgetting about his phone. As he reached for it and grabbed it, he turned around to see who the giant was.

The person was…
111121211221111221312112.title: They can’t truly chill out this time

choices: The boys get to the ring to make a wish
1111212112211112213121122.content:
The soup ladle was being held in the hands of the boys' 20 year old cousin, Diane. Diane was famous in the family for being absolutely ravenous, willing to eat just about anything. When the children were younger, Diane used to tease them and Megan, saying she would eat them in an attempt to scare them.

Unfortunately for the boys, that joke was looking more and more like a reality. Both boys were dumped into Diane's awaiting bowl. Just as they resurfaced in the chili, Diane dumped another scoop on top of them.

"Hungry, Diane?" a voice called out from behind. Diane jumped slightly, then turned and smiled.

"Aunt Sandra, you scared me," she laughed. "And yep, you know me, I'm always starving."

The irony here was that Sandra had no idea her two sons were struggling to resurface in Diane's chili. All she knew was that her children and other relatives were somewhere on the table and she came over to take a look.

"So how've you been?" Sandra said as she went to give Diane a hug. Unbeknownst to both women, when Diane extended her arms to hug Sandra, she brushed against her hand. This caused the magic ring to fall right in the bowl of chili with a splash.

After the woman talked for a bit, Diane decided to go take a seat and dig into her chili. Sandra meanwhile, had yet to realize what happened to the ring.

"Damn, this looks good," Diane whispered as she scooped up a spoonful and brought it to her mouth.

"Look out!" Jon screamed, as both he and Blake narrowly avoided the spoon.

"What do we do?" Blake asked, as Diane lowered her spoon again?
1111212112211112213121122.title: Their 20 year old cousin, Diane

choices: Mom knew where we were (Sandra appears, shrunken)
11112121122111122131211223.content:
The boys struggled desperately through the chili as the ravenous Diane plunged in her instrument of destruction (her spoon) and scooped up more of the delicious stew. "What are we gonna do?" cried Blake, hoping that his older brother had a plan.

Fortunately for the two tiny boys, Jon did have a plan. He had noticed the ring when they were buried under the chili, and knew they just had to get to it. "Cmon dig around, we need to find that ring!" he shouted, as he desperately dove under the surface.

While Blake and Jon searched the chili bowl for the magic ring. Diane was casually having a very nice time. She sat alone with her chili on her lap. She enjoyed the quiet and sitting in the shade, as was waiting till the line died down before she could go back for another bowl without being judged.

Plunging her sooon near the boys, she hoisted another scoop into the air. When she did this, she revealed the location of the ring.

"Quick Blake, grab it and make a wish!" Jon shouted, as it was out of his reach.

Blake dove face first into the goop and managed to grab the ring with his right hand. It was far larger than his body, but he just needed to touch it, not hold it.

Taking a deep breath, Blake shouted. "Magic ring, I wish....
11112121122111122131211223.title: The boys get to the ring to make a wish

choices: She recognized the boys, and eventually decides to be nice to them
She recognized the boys and hears what happens, but decides to eat them anyways
She thought the boys were bugs, but what will she decide to do with them?
111121211221111221312112231.content:
As soon as they made the wish, a bright light flashed. Diane covered her eyes quickly when it appeared, confused of where it came from. Once it disappeared, she was about to pretend it didn’t happen and go back to eating when a thought suddenly appeared in her head.

I need to stop eating for now. Something is in my food and I need to check it out. Diane suddenly thought(she wasn’t sure where the thought came from, but she decided to trust it).

Diane peered into her bowl and suddenly noticed a ring. She had no idea where it came from, but she kind of wanted to swallow it. She dipped her spoon in and grabbed it, lifting the ring up. After a moment however, she noticed something next to the ring, something that wasn’t technically food. She looked a bit closer trying to figure out what it was.
111121211221111221312112231.title: Waiter, there’s a ring in my chili

choices: Diane was telling Sandra what she did and what she was going to do
Diane found Ollie and Jasmine first
1111212112211112213121122312.content:
She realized that they were Sandra’s kids, Jon and Blake. She put the ring on and then pulled the spoon closer so she could hear they boys.

“What are you two so small, and why are you in my food?” She asked. The two shrunken boys told her everything. She listened carefully, becoming more curious. When they got done, her first thought was to get them to safety. However, a thought suddenly appeared that stuck to her mind.

She loved to eat, and wanted to taste and swallow everything she could. So the fact that Megan was shrunk felt like an opportunity to her. Diane had swallowed a lot in the past like toys or pieces of clothing and had always teased Megan about it, saying that she could have been on the menu as well. The only reason she never tasted her before was because she was family and at a normal size. However, now that Megan was shrunk, and Diane had a magic ring, it was possible without any problems or consequences.

“So… this ring can bring people back to life… right?” Diane asked. After hesitating for a second, Jon nodded, a little worried about what she was thinking. “Well that’s good. That means I can eat you and nobody can truly complain. I’ve always wanted to taste a person before.” Diane said, bringing her spoon into her mouth. The two boys screamed as she tossed them around with her tongue before swallowing them. The two boys quickly traveled down into her stomach. Blake looked around to see there was a bit of fabric, the head of a lego man, and some food that wasn’t completely digested yet. The two boys rushed to get onto a safe platform.

“I should have known she wanted to eat us. With our new size, we’re perfect for the menu.” Jon said, frustrated with himself.

“I don’t think we were her target though. She only ate us so we couldn’t tell her.” Blake said, pulling out his phone. Though Diane was unaware of the phones, they had short-circuited before.

“Her? You mean mom, correct?”

“No, I mean Megan. Remember, Diane used to tease us. I guess you wouldn’t know this though, but she once told me she really wished she could specifically eat Megan. I think it was because for whatever reason, Megan looked extremely delicious to her.” Jon put his face in his hands.

“Oh man, that means she’s probably going after her right now. If she wants to eat her that badly, I can’t imagine the kinds of things Diane might do to prepare her.”

Meanwhile, on the outside…
1111212112211112213121122312.title: A hungry girl with a target

choices: Megan decides to fight until the end
Megan decides to do as Diane says
Megan will do what Diane says, as long as Megan’s mother joins her
11112121122111122131211223121.content:
Ollie and Jasmine were too distracted with each other to notice that Diane was approaching. The giantess scanned until she spotted Megan alone. With great speed, she captured the girl and walked off without anyone noticing. As Diane went into the house, Megan was extremely confused. One minute, she was just thinking to herself and looking down at the grass, the next she had been kidnapped and was being taken somewhere. Megan sat quietly until light appeared and she fell herself fall onto a soft surface. She quickly noticed she was currently in her bedroom on her blanket.

“Oh man, you look so irresistible.” A familiar, but scary voice said. Megan turned around to confirm her suspicions: Diane.

“What are you doing? How did you know where I was?” Megan asked, panicked.

“Your brothers told me everything when I found them in my chili. I also found the magic ring they mentioned, right before I sent them down to my belly.” Diane said, patting her belly. The giantess went and locked the bedroom door. “They weren’t that bad I suppose, but you’re the one I really want.” Diane leaned in and licked Megan, covering her in saliva. Megan looked at her belly. It was hard to imagine that her brothers were now inside her.

“So… are you going to swallow me just like how you ate them?” Megan asked, making Diane laugh.

“I have dreamed of you in my stomach. I’m not just going to swallow you easily, I want to enjoy this moment. I’m probably going to make you a little bigger so that you’ll fill me up more. I also might tie you up before I get to the real preparations. However, you could go along with this willingly. That would save a bit of trouble. I’m sure you’re at least a little curious as to what it feels like to be eaten. I’ll let you decide right now.” Diane said, licking her lips. Megan thought about her two choices.

She could try to run and struggle, however she probably wouldn’t escape. Diane had the ring so she currently had complete control of the situation. Not even her mother could do anything now. However, Megan could still fight just to make things more interesting for Diane, and the shrunken girl wasn’t that weak(meaning she could put up quite a fight).

However, if Megan went along, things would probably be less painful. Diane was correct, Megan did kind of wonder what it would be like to be Diane’s prey. She was going to end up in her belly either way.

“So what will it be? Are you going to struggle, or will you let me prepare and eat you?” Diane questioned one more time.
11112121122111122131211223121.title: The target has now been captured

111121211221111221312112231213.content:
Megan sighed as she knew the only way she would ever (maybe) get back to normal was if she cooperated and agreed to be Diane's meal. She just hoped it wouldn't be too painful. After all, Diane had the magic ring, meaning she could do anything she wanted with it.

"Okay Diane, you win," Megan complained.

Diane smiled greedily. She licked her lips and lifted up the tiny Megan.

"No wait, not yet," Megan screamed.

Diane looked at her with annoyed eyes. "What?" she spat out.

"Can you do something for me?" Megan asked. "Can you shrink my mom and eat her too?"

Upon hearing this, Diane's eyes lit up. She was about to get a bonus treat, two tiny people for the price of one.

"Damn right I can. I wish she was here and your size," Diane laughed.

With a flash, Sandra suddenly appeared in Diane's hand. "What the hell?" she asked, looking around confused. "Megan? But you're...." her eyes focused up on Diane's hungry face and she screamed.

"HI AUNT SANDY," Diane laughed. "I FOUND YOUR MAGIC RING. NOW IM GONNA EAT YOU AND MEGAN!"

"No you can't," Sandra pleaded, as Diane dropped them onto her tongue.

"Don't worry, I'll bring you guys back....probably," Diane said.

Upon hearing this both Megan and Diane started screaming, but Diane's tongue maneuvered them towards the back of the throats where they were to be swallowed.

With a gulp, Diane sent them down her esophagus. "Ahhhh, what next," Diane said.

Diane decided to use the ring to mess with
111121211221111221312112231213.title: Sandra caught off guard

11112121122111122131211223122.content:
Diana let out a quiet burp, as she enjoyed the feeling of her two younger cousins struggling for survival inside of her stomach. She really wanted to find Megan. Megan was ravenous and wanted nothing more than the satisfaction of swallowing her tiny cousin, whole. However, as she starred at the magic ring that she had fished out of her chili, she thought of an idea to mess with her aunt Sandra.

"Hey Aunt Sandra, what's going on?" Diane said, making casual conversation.

Sandra looked over and smiled. "Not much? What did you have to eat?"

It took all of Diane's willpower not to break out into laughter right there. "Oh, just some chili, some chips, both of your sons," she said casually.

Sandra began to choke on her lemonade and ended up spitting it out. "What?!" was all she could manage to say.

Diane just shrugged. "Yeah, they were swimming in my chili and told me about the ring. They're in my tummy right now," she laughed.

Sandra did not know how to react. She didn't know if she should be angry or terrified. Her beloved sons, Blake and Jon, were puropsley eaten by her voracious neice.

"Relax, I can always bring them back with the ring," Diane teased. After an awkward pause, Diane smiled. "Well, I'm gonna go try to find Megan and eat her too. Wanna watch?"

Sandra was still stunned and did not know what to say. She only managed to stutter...
11112121122111122131211223122.title: How does Auntie handle it?

111121211221111221312113.content:
As she was alone and didn't have much else to do, Megan decided to try to scale the soda can. Obviously it was cold and slick, and Megan had very little traction, but this girl was determined to reach the top, pop the lid, and enjoy a tasty beverage.

Megan had made it roughly half way up when the unexpected occurred. All of the shrinkees were so caught up in exploring the giant food, they failed to remember about the massive party guests. This became apparent as one individual was looking to quench their thirst. They saw a can of cola just sitting on the table, unopened and reached for it.

Having previously been hanging on to her side, Megan began to slide down. She knew she was going to lose her grip. She was right. Megan screamed as she fell through the air. She expected to land on the floor with a splat. However, she landed in some strange white landscape. It did not take her long to realize she was in an empty solo cup the person was holding.

Megan watched in fear as she saw the open can of soda appear over the rim of the cup. "Oh no," she said to herself, as rivers of brown cola began to flow down the walls. She was swept off her feet and thrown all about the cup. When she finally got her bearings and resurfaced, she let out s scream.

The carbonation from the cola was really hurting her eyes, and nearly choking on it meant she was constantly spitting out cola. Managing to tread water for now, Megan pulled out her phone.

That's when the situation went from bad to worse. The liquid had totally killed Megan's phone. "Mom, help me! I'm in here," Megan cried, not knowing where her mother was.

As the giant person began to tilt the drink towards their face, Megan realized the person sipping the drink was indeed...
111121211221111221312113.title: A soda can

choices: A shadow suddenly looms over them
Ollie calls Sandra and tells her everything
Jasmine suddenly panics as she sees a bug on the table, heading towards them
1111212112211112213121132.content:
Megan couldn’t believe that it was her father who was about to gulp her down. She tried to swim away, but the current was just too strong. She screamed as the light of day disappeared from her view. Gary swallowed, causing his daughter to slide down his throat into his belly.

When she landed, she was pretty cold and very wet. She knew she was about to get digested, but she wasn’t afraid. She just couldn’t believe that she was the first to fall victim, again! Especially considering the fact that her mother stepped on her before, and now her father just gulped her down. She was also a 100% sure that it had just been her currently, just like before.

“Why is it always me? And why to my parents? Do they just love killing me?” She asked, though she was smart enough to know that both times, her parents were unaware of her. This time especially, since her father had no idea she was even there. Though her eyes hurt from the soda, she laid against the stomach wall. She was either going to get completely digested and then get brought back to life, safe and sound. Or she was going to get teleported out before she died, though she wasn’t sure which one it would be. She just had to be patient.
————————————-
Meanwhile, on the outside, Gary’s appearance startled everyone. That had no idea that Megan was now in her stomach, but they were smart enough to try and get away from food as quickly as possible(interestingly enough, both groups were either on or in food at the moment, making the situation a bit dangerous).

Ollie and Jasmine scrambled off of the burger they were on and rushed to the middle of the table. As Blake and Jon struggled to get out of the bowl of chili, their dad had decided that he wanted some, grabbing a small bowl, ready to scoop some out.

“Hurry! He’s going to grab us!” Blake yelled.

“I can see that!” Jon replied frantically. As their dad was scooping some out, the two boys finally climbed out, safe now. They ran to join Ollie and Jasmine. When she saw their clothes, she could tell they had been in the chili. She wanted to yell at them for doing something dangerous, but she really coudn’t considering she and her boyfriend had been on a hamburger.

“Where’s Megan?” Ollie asked, a little worried. None of them knew, however, Jon had a dreadful idea. He watched his dad walk away and drop an empty can of soda in the trash.

“I think… our dad… drank her.” He said, causing everyone to turn to him. “I saw her by a soda can but she didn’t seem like she was trying to climb it so I didn’t think anything of it at the time, but I know that dad had gotten some soda…” He trailed off, leading the others to piece it together.

“What’s with her and getting killed by our parents? Does she enjoy it or something?” Blake asked, though he knew it was probably not entirely her fault. “Soo… who’s going to make the call to mom?” He asked. Though they knew they could bring Megan back with the ring that Sandra had, it still felt awkward calling and telling her that her daughter and eaten.

“I’ll do it.” Ollie said. He was the adult of this group. Though nobody had said anything, he was most likely considered responsible for everyone.
1111212112211112213121132.title: Swallowed by her pop

11112121122111122131212.content:
The tiny group decided to tempt fate by going near a giant. However, everyone pretty much decided for Sandra to choose which giant she should set them near. She probably knew everyone the best after all.

“Can you set us next to a giant please? And we would like you to choose which one.” Megan said, making Sandra a bit surprised. She knew they wanted adventure, but this might be going a bit overboard. However, she didn’t argue and looked to see who might be a good choice.

The first person she saw was her father, Max. At first, Sandra considered this a completely horrible idea. Her father hated bugs more than her, and he was much crueler to them as well. However, he could make their adventure “interesting” and Sandra did have the ring to revive them when they died.

The next person she saw was Diane. Diane loved to eat, and would eat literally anything, even bugs. However, Sandra didn’t think that Diane hated bugs, not entirely at least.

As Sandra looked, she did have another option to consider. Her husband wasn’t that far from her currently, and she could easily ask to toy with them. Not only that, but Sandra would also be able to participate with him fairly easily.

After a moment, Sandra decided to take her shrunken family…
11112121122111122131212.title: Scary and powerful giants nearby

choices: Come clean and tell him what's going on
11112121122111122131213.content:
As Sandra smiled down at her shrunken children, as well as Ollie and Jasmine in the palm of her hand, she jumped in surprise when she heard a voice behind her.

"Hey honey, what're you doing?"

Sandra turned to see her husband Gary. He had walked away from the grill and entered the kitchen to get a new pair of BBQ tongs.

Unsure of what to say, Sandra started stuttering. "I...uhhh.....I was just talking....to," she could barely finish her sentence as she kept nervously looking at her hand.

Not an idiot, Gary picked up on this. "Why do you keep looking at your hand?" he asked, before glancing down himself.

Gary narrowed his eyes as he saw what appeared to be five tiny bugs in the palm of his wife's hand. "Why are you holding those bugs?" Gary asked with a confused laugh. "You hate bugs with a passion."

Sandra was at a loss for words. She was starting to sweat and panic now. She thought her husband would judge her if she told the truth, but st the same time did not want to lie.

Sandra decides to.....
11112121122111122131213.title: Inquisitive Gary

choices: To go with her father’s idea
To go with her mother’s idea
They actually wanted them to treat the group like bugs
111121211221111221312131.content:
After a moment of thinking about her response, she decided to just tell him the truth, it would make things easier after all. She told him everything:the ring, what she did before, how the tiny group wanted to have fun. As she spoke, the shrunken group simply watched and listened.

Once she got done, her husband didn’t know what to say. It was a bit much to take in. However, it did make him a bit curious. He suddenly noticed her worried expression and smiled, having an idea of why she looked worried.

“Hey don’t worry about before. It sounds like as long as you have the ring, things will be fine.” Gary said, giving his wife a kiss. He then looked down at her passengers. “So where are you taking them?”

“They haven’t decided yet. We don’t want to let the others know so that it might be a bit more interesting. Say…do you have any ideas?” Sandra asked. Gary though for a moment.

“Well, this is a barbecue, I could add them to food so they can see what it feels like to be eaten.” Gary suggested. He then looked around the backyard.

“Hm, perhaps I can place them in the grass by the tree. I bet they can explore over there.” Sandra suggested as well. After a minute, Megan called her to tell them what the group decided.
111121211221111221312131.title: A new person aware of this adventure

1111212112211112213121311.content:
"Well kids, what do you want to do?" Sandra said, looking down with a smile. In the palm of her hand, Blake, Jon, Megan, Ollie and Jasmine all seemed to be gathered together.

Within a minute, Sandra's phone began to ring. It was Megan calling. "Hello sweetie," Sandra laughed. She could hear Megan's voice on the phone, but it was incredibly high pitches and nearly inaudible. However, Sandra was sure she could make out the words "food, table, and dad's idea."

"Okay, were gonna put you little bugs by the food," Sandra said, closing her hand around her three and sized children, their cousin, and his girlfriend. The phone cut off when she did this.

"Is the food ready?" she asked Gary.

"Just about, I'll let people know it's time to eat," he said walking away.

Sandra walked up the table outside. It was quite the impressive spread of food. She looked into her hand and began splitting people up at random. She dropped Megan and Blake onto the tray of hamburgers, Ollie and Jon landed in a try of strawberry jello, and poor little Jasmine was all alone in a plate of potato chips.

"Okay people are on their way," Gary said, grabbing Sandra's butt and giving her a kiss.

"Excellent," she whispered, clutching the ring tightly. "Good luck kids," she said.

While most of the shrinkees were excited, Jasmine was absolutely terrified. She didn't want to be this small, didn't want to be alone, and didn't want to be hear. Then people began standing over the food.

Diana was grabbing a hamburger with Megan and Blake holding on to the bun. Jane, Ollie's mom, was scooping jello with Ollie and Jon in her scoop. Michael, the creepy 13 year old who had previously been eyeing Jasmine early, now accidentally grabbed her along with his potato chips.

Who do you follow next?
1111212112211112213121311.title: To go with her father’s idea

11112121122111122131213111.content:
Blake and Megan landed on a tasty burger. They watched as their parents walked away.

“Hey Megan, you were crushed before right? What’s it like to die, is it painful?” Blake asked. Megan simply smiled.

“Honestly, I don’t completely remember. I was under mom’s foot before suddenly waking up with everyone. Tell me, are you afraid to be eaten?” Megan asked, getting comfortable.

“Not at all. I want to know what it’s like to be eaten by someone. I wonder who it’ll be. Are you afraid?”

“You know, I probably should be but I’m not. Having the knowledge that you’ll come back to life and having been killed before sort of takes away some of the fear.” Megan said. As they were talking, everything around them suddenly got dark and they felt themselves being moved fast.

“Did someone grab us?” Blake asked before a giant set of teeth suddenly appeared to the side, taking away some of the burger. Megan ran to Blake and held him. The giant placed their burger on another one that was on a plate and went to sit down on a lawn chair. Blake looked down to see the other burger and some fruit with it. “Whoa, this person must be hungry.”

“There’s only one person that I can think of that gets this hungry.” Megan said, looking at their captor, getting a better look at them.

Megan and Blake were quickly able to tell that the giantess who had them was none other than their cousin Diane (or Diana as some people called her). Diana was 20 years old with short brown hair. Despite her slender figure, she loved to eat and would eat almost anything. Though Diana sometimes chewed, she loved swallowing things whole and almost never gained weight from it. Megan could even remember times where she was teased about possibly being on the menu.

“I can’t believe it’s her. If she discovers me, she’ll be teasing me left and right before swallowing me.” Megan said quietly. The two of them watched the giantess place a strawberry in her mouth and swallow it whole.

“I wonder, do you think she would be happy to eat us fin she discovered us, even though we’re humans?” Blake asked Megan.

“Trust me, if she finds us, I guarantee you she will think of us as food more than humans.” Megan said, watching Blake step closer. Before she could react, Diana took a huge bite along with Blake and swallowed, not chewing much. The shrunken girl watched the bulge go down her throat. Diana burped and licked her lips, preparing to take another bite.
11112121122111122131213111.title: Megan and the giantess with a planet sized hunger

111121211221111221312131113.content:
Diana was happily enjoying her food without a care in the world. She was about to take another bite when she noticed something on her burger. She grabbed it and pulled it up to eye level, expecting it to be a nice juicy bug. However, upon close inspection, she realized it was Megan. Diane gave a big smile as she had always dreamed of eating her. She just hadn’t before because she was family and had no good reason to.

“Well, what do we have here? A tiny girl sitting upon my burger waiting to be eaten.” Diana said, smiling. Megan knew there was no way out of her grasp.

“Diane wait. There’s something you should know first.” Megan said. Diana nodded and leaned in to hear her better. The shrunken girl told her everything, including about the ring and how Blake was currently in her stomach. Diana simply giggled.

“I hope he’s having fun in there. You’ll be joining him soon.” The giantess said, giving her a taste. “Mm, you taste better than I ever imagined.”

1111212112211112213121311132.content:
“Let’s go to the kitchen to prepare you first.” Diane said. Megan watched as she shoved the rest of her burger into her mouth and swallowed. The giantess gave a loud belch before heading inside. The tiny girl shuddered as she stared at the mighty belly. Now that Diane had her, Megan would be her meal no matter what. The giantess set her down on the counter and smiled.

“So…how will you prepare me?” Megan asked, nervous. Diane giggled and licked her lips.

“I think a tied up meal will nice, but there are a few things to do first and you’ll just have to wait and see. First though, I want you to strip down.” Diane said.

“But…but you can eat my clothes…right? Why do I have to be naked?”

“Because, I’m going to warm you up and I don’t want you getting burned. Besides, food doesn’t wear clothes. Now, strip or else I’ll have to do it for you.” Megan flinched but did as she was told. Once she was naked, the giantess smiled. “Mm, what a tasty looking piece of meat you are. Now, don’t go anywhere while I set things up.”

Diane pulled out some string and set it next to the small girl, making Megan flinch. She knew Diane was hungry, but the small girl wondered what the giantess really thought about her.

“Um…Diane, do you…what am I to you?” Megan asked. Diane stopped for the moment and looked at her.

“What do you mean?”

“Even when I was normal sized, do you see me as a family member or just a piece of meat?”

“I’ll be honest. I see you as both. You are my family and I care about you, but you also look so tasty.” Diane said. There was a bit of silence before Diane spoke up. “Did you know I almost ate you once?” Megan flinched and gave her a confused look.

“What do you mean?”

“You probably don’t remember this, but when you were five years old, I almost ate you. I was 14 and was very hungry even then. Your family was visiting and I was in my bedroom with a lot of fruit. I guess you saw me and became interested. I was so busy chowing down, I didn’t notice you.” Diane said. Megan was interested as she didn’t remember this at all.

“What happened next?”

“Well, you picked up an orange at the same time I picked it up. I pulled it into my mouth and swallowed it. I ended up pulling your arms in before I realized you were there. When I did, I immediately pulled you out, startled. At the time, most people thought I was a freak for how much I ate. They didn’t want to be around me. You on the other hand…you were interested. You then handed me an apple and asked me to swallow it in front of you. Heh…you were so amazed when I swallowed it whole. You actually asked me if I could swallow you as well.”

“Did you try to?”

“I told you no but you kept asking me. I’ll be honest though, your arms tasted so good. If your mother hadn’t walked in at that time, you might have convinced me to try and eat you there. After that, I became interested in the idea and even had a dream about having you for dinner. However, that day wasn’t the just the start of me fantasizing about eating you.”

“Really? What else did it start?” Megan asked. She was pretty fascinated by the story and was becoming more interested in Diane.

“It was the start of a friendship. That may sound cheesy, but you were the first person to really accept me, appetite and all. Because of you, I became more confident and happier. So when ask how do I see you, yes, I see you as a tasty meal, but I also see you as my first friend. I care about you more than anybody else.” Diane gave a soft smile and picked Megan up. The giantess gave her a warm hug, making Megan feel safe. When she put her back down, Megan smiled, forgetting any fear she had before.

“So, How what’s the first step in my preparation?” Megan asked. The giantess smiled and licked her lips.

“Well, I’m going to…”

She had to admit to herself though, she was definitely relieved that she would not be shrunken down. Unlike everyone else, she had no choice when she shrunk, and thought the experice was scary enough he first time.

"Okay, I'll take the ring, I guess," she said, as Sandra placed it in the palm of her hand. "I wish the five of you would shrink down to the size of bugs," Jasmine was, closing her hand around the ring.

There was a bright flash and Jasmine now saw five "bugs" on the floor where her boyfriend, his aunt and cousins once stood.

"Oh my god," Jasmine whispered, as she bent down and collected the shrinkees. "You're all so cute!"

For the five shrunken people, they were staring up in amazement. Particularly Sandra, who had not been shrunken before. She was having a hard time processing just how small she was and how massive her nephews girlfriend was.

Ollie whipped out his phone and sent off a text. "Damn, babe! Looking sexy as ever ;),".

Jasmine looked at her phone and bit her lip. She really wanted to have some alone time with Ollie right now. "So where do you guys wanna go?" she asked.

Jasmine lifted them up to her ear and heard them squeak "outside!" Jasmine was happy to oblige, carrying them out to the patio. She spied Gary, their husband and father. Trying to be inconspicuous, Jasmine lowered her hand down by the base of Gary's lawn chair, allowing Sandra, Jon, Megan, and Blake to hop off.

Walking quickly, Jasmine re-entered the house. "Well I think we need to have some alone time," she said to Ollie. She teased giving him a giant kiss but then pulled him away. Instead she would pulling the elastic on her jeans oh, and pulling back the lacy underwear she wore. "Like what you see?" she boggles, before dropping Ollie in and then releasing her underwear.

She moaned, as the Lacey fabric had trapped Ollie right against her vagina. She rushed upstairs and found an empty bedroom, locking the door. Who do you follow next?
1111212112211112213122.title: Jasmine the Giantess

choices: To go search for more bugs, like Megan said.
To hide under a chair and watch Sandra’s father, like Jon said.
Sandra’s father suddenly noticed them and went to grab them.
11112121122111122131221.content:
Sandra watched as Jasmine quickly went back inside with Ollie. The shrunken woman simply smiled, she knew their situation. Ollie liked giant girls and was currently tiny in the hands of Jasmine who loved him, it was a perfect combination. Once the giantess disappeared from her view, Sandra looked around.

Sandra had been annoyed at little things, so it was an extremely weird feeling to have been shrunk. The chair that she liked to lay in was now so much larger, she couldn’t even compare it to anything else she had seen. The grass was now up to her pelvis as if it had suddenly overgrown.

“So, what should we check out?” Megan asked, excitedly. “Why don’t we see if we can find some actual bugs?” Sandra was a little startled by the question. Although she knew the bugs wouldn’t care who she was, the shrunken mother knew it would be weird to confront a bug that was now the same size as her when she had stepped on so many in the past. Sandra started to look up to the sky to think when she saw something that scared her.

“LOOK OUT!” Sandra yelled, rushing to her kids and started to hold them. A giant shoe suddenly landed next to them, startling everyone.

“Whoa!” Blake said, getting out of Sandra’s grasp and started getting closer.

“Be careful!” His mother said, worried about getting crushed. She looked up and became more scared when she recognized the face. It was her father, Max. She watched him sit down in the chair next to them and get relaxed.

Her father was 58 years old, and loved to be a predator. He liked to hunt animals(though he never went overboard with it) and kill bugs. In fact, Sandra got her hatred of small things from her father. He had no limit to how many bugs he would kill, and he didn’t always kill them in a normal way. Although he liked to crush them under his foot, he sometimes put them inside his shoe to crush or crush them between his toes. He also liked to cook and prepare bugs. Max liked to put them in the microwave or the oven, he also would cut them up or freeze them in juice.

Sandra remembered a time when she was young. She had just came in after playing outside. Her father spotted a bug that had been on her head. She had watched him grab it and dropped it in his shoe. He had said they needed to learn their place.

“Be glad you’re not tiny. I would kill you just like any other bug.” He had told her.

When she had realized that it was her father, she immediately grabbed Blake’s arm.

“No! Don’t go towards him. Trust me, he’ll kill you in a horrible way.” She said, leaving Blake a little disappointed.

“Well, we could probably hide and watch what he does.” Jon said. “This way, we can observe a giant from a bug’s perspective, but safely.” Despite that plan sounding not too bad, it still left Sandra a bit worried.

“I still think we should go find some more bugs.” Megan said. After a minute, they decide…
11112121122111122131221.title: The source of Sandra’s hatred towards bugs

111121211221111221312213.content:
As the shrunken quartet of Sandra, Jon, Blake and Megan discussed what their plan would be, they made one crucial mistake, they were not paying attention to their surroundings.

"I still wanna go exploring," whined Megan.

"No Meg, we should stay here," insisted Jon.

Sandra rolled her eyes. She really did not like being this vulnerable out in the open. She was starting to wonder what her children were talking about when they said being small was awesome. Sandra was really starting to hate it.

That feeling would not subside. While her children bickered, a haunting shadow overtook Sandra's tiny body. She and the kids looked up, only to see her giant father, and the kids grandpa, staring down at her.

"HUH, I THOUGHT I TAUGHT SANDRA BETTER THAN TO HAVE BUGS IN HER YARD," Max said, though no one was close enough to hear him. He lowered down his giant hand and easily scooped up his daughter and three grandchildren.

None of the shrunken people had any opportunity to react, as they were swiped in in Max's hands far too quickly.

"Mom what's gonna happen to us?" cried Blake, as they were lifted high into the air.

"I don't know, sweetie," Sandra lied. She was trying to hide the tears in her eyes and fear in her voice. She knew exactly what her father was capable of.

Max held the four shrunken people in front her his face. "WELL I KNOW HOW MUCH MY LITTLE SANDY HATES BUGS," he said, unaware that she was right in front of him. Sandra and the kids were desperately trying to get his attention, though Max was not wearing his glasses, and his 58 year old eyes could not tell the difference between them and bugs.

"I GUESS I'LL DO US BOTH A FAVOR AND GET RID OF YOU GUYS," he said ominously. Sandra could not hide the nervous whimper that escaped her lips.

Max walked inside the house and into the kitchen. He smiled, realizing it was empty and everyone in the family was outside, or so he thought. He glanced down at his left hand where the four tiny people were located. Then he lowered down his right hand and plucked up two of the bugs, not knowing they were Megan and Blake.

"No put them down," screamed Sandra, though her calls fell on deaf ears.

"Sandra will thank me for this," Max whispered to himself. With a manical look in his eye, he carried Blake and Megan towards....
111121211221111221312213.title: Noticed by Max

choices: He grabbed the small one(Jon)and decided to cut him up and add him to a sandwich
He grabbed the tall one(Sandra)and decided to freeze her in juice for a popsicle
He grabbed both of them, and decided to play a game of cat and mouse with them
1111212112211112213122131.content:
Max set the “bugs” on a plate and placed them in the microwave. Everyone who was shrunk watched helplessly as the massive door shut. The giant simply smiled and set the timer for 15 seconds. Once he started it, he took the other two and dropped them into a tall clear cup and waited for his snacks to finish.
——————————
Sandra knew she should text Jasmine, but the thought of her kids in the microwave left her feeling hopeless. Even though the ring could bring them back, Sandra just felt too depressed to make the decision.

As for Jon, he had accidentally dropped his phone when his grandfather picked him up. He hadn’t even thought of his mother’s phone, instead, he wondered what his grandpa was planning for him and his mother. If Jon had a choice, he would probably pick being crushed in someway.
——————————
When the two shrunken kids watched the microwave door shut, they didn’t know what to think. Blake was really scared that he was about to burn to death, Megan was nervous, but ready to die again. It can be kind of hard to be scared about death when you already died once.

They both immediately started to get really warm. Without saying a word, they both had they same idea(that probably wouldn’t help much admittedly). They started to take their clothes off and threw them in a pile, hoping to subtract some of the heat. They were too distracted to get embarrassed by the other. Megan and Blake both collapsed pretty quickly though.

Just when Megan thought she really was going to die because of the heat, the machine stopped, and she could hear the sound when the microwave gets done. As the shrunken girl stared up, she could see the world moving. She was too weak and exhausted to look around her. Her grandpa’s face came into view, and he had a sharp weapon.
——————————
Sandra stared as the plate with her offspring was set on the table. Jon held her, unable to look, but Sandra was unable to look away. Megan and Blake weren’t moving, and there was a burnt pile of ash next to them. Her father sat down with a fork in hand, making sure she had a view of what he was about to do. Sandra watched as the giant stabbed his fork through Blake and lifted him up to his mouth.
——————————
Megan currently felt defeated as she watched her brother being carried up by the sharp weapon to the giant’s mouth. She was able to tell that the microwave had finished him before he left, so she was glad he wouldn’t have to feel the fork or teeth, unlike her. The giant chewed Blake up and moaned with delight.

“What a taste! I suppose that pathetic bug did have a use after all. I hope the next one tastes even better.” The fork came down again and pierced Megan’s stomach. Though it hurt a little, the microwave had actually made her body a bit numb(not that that was an entirely good thing).

Megan watched as the giant mouth got closer and closer. However, Max had apparently decided to taste test her first, giving her a thorough lick.

“Mm, this one DOES taste better. If my daughter were around, I would let her eat it. Too bad I have to eat this one right now.” Max said, placing her into his mouth. He tossed her naked body around like a piece of candy, before deciding to swallow her whole. Megan didn’t make it that far though as all of the chaos in the mouth caused her to pass out.
——————————
Max swallowed the “bug” down, and gave a burp. He leaned back and patted his belly. Those were some of the best bugs ever, but he had no idea why. He looked at his other two prisoners and smiled.
1111212112211112213122131.title: A nice warm meal for the cruel giant

choices: He decides to literally drown her in ice cream
He decides to blend up fruit for a smoothie, and she will be a part of it
Jasmine suddenly walks in the room and asks what is happening
11112121122111122131221311.content:
Max reached into the cup and pulled Jon out. Sandra screamed as she watched her last son being pulled away. To lose another child in a horrible way, it was unbearable. Jon didn’t struggle in his grandfather’s grip, he saw no point in it. The giant placed his little “bug” in his shirt pocket and got to work on his next meal.

Max took out two slices of bread and covered one of them in peanut butter. As he worked, Jon peeked over to see what was happening. His mother had lost all hope and couldn’t bear to look. Jon then saw what kind of sandwich he was making. As Max placed the jelly on the other piece, Jon was a little happy. He knew there was no escape and he was going to get eaten no matter what, so being eaten in his favorite after-school snack wasn’t that bad of a choice to him.

Jon suddenly felt himself being lifted up and saw that he was being placed on a cutting board face up. Max had grabbed a sharper knife and raised it over his little prey. Jon couldn’t help but think of this as kind of like a surgery, except this is one that he wouldn’t survive.

“Are you ready pathetic insect? I’m going to cut you into tiny pieces and eat you. Don’t worry, this won’t take long.” Max said. Jon watched as the blade came down fast, cutting his arm off. It hurt like crazy, but Jon held his screams back. He then saw the giant grab it and place it on his sandwich. The giant continued to do the same with the rest of his limbs before raising his weapon over Jon’s neck. Jon closed his eyes as it came down and killed him.

Sandra had been looking away this entire time. She knew that if she looked, it would terrify her. However, she slowly, but eventually, took a look. She immediately regretted her decision. She could see severed pieces on the giant sandwich. Her dad simply smiled at her.

“Did you want to be a part of my sandwich? I could cover you in your friend’s remains.” Max said, still completely unaware of who she was. Sandra felt like she was about to vomit, though she kept it in. “Don’t worry, I’ll eventually get to you.”

Max closed up his sandwich and started to eat it. He made sure to enjoy each bite. It was the tastiest sandwich he ever had. As he finished up, Sandra closed her eyes.

“I swear, if Jasmine brings us back, I’m going to give my father the same treatment.” She said quietly. She felt herself being picked up and soon confronted the giant face.

“You’re the last one. Now what should I do with you?”
11112121122111122131221311.title: Becoming one with the sandwich

choices: They all appeared physically fine with no memories of what happened.
They all appeared physically fine but remembered everything.
The kids appeared physically fine but Sandra wanted nothing but revenge
All of them appeared but had amnesia that couldn’t be fixed by wishing
111121211221111221312213112.content:
The giant thought about it for a moment. He wanted to eat this insect but wanted it to be in some unique way. An idea soon came to mind, making Max grin. Sandra started to cry, knowing it was going to be something horrible.

“How about I make your trip down my throat a bit easier huh?” He asked. He pulled out the blender and opened it up. Sandra’s eyes widened as she saw her destination. The tiny girl started to struggle making the giant grin even more.

“How pathetic. Do you really think you can escape my jaws? I am invincible.” He said. The giant dropped Sandra in and searched for fruits to add. As the shrunken woman fell, she cut her arm pretty badly on the blade. She screamed out in pain as blood started to drip. The giant simply hummed as he worked.

Max soon added strawberries, cherries and a banana to the blender. Sandra’s pain worsened as all of the weight pressed against her. As the Titan sealed the blender up, Sandra cried, more than she had ever before. Today was 4th of July, it was supposed to be a happy day. They had planned a barbecue and even invited their family for the fun. But now, her family had been tortured and devoured by her merciless father. He had taken everything away from her just because of her size.

“Goodbye stupid insect. Say hello to the others when you see them.” Max said. Sandra closed her eyes just as her father flicked the switch. In an instant, her body was torn apart. As she merged with the drink, the man licked his lips. He couldn’t wait to try this treat.

When it got done, Max opened it up and lifted it up. He wasted no time in devouring the blender’s contents. As the smoothie touched his tongue, Max fell in love. He had never tasted anything so good before. The man drank every last drop, making sure there was no trace left behind. He slapped his belly and belched.

“How delicious. At least I made their pathetic lives useful.” He said to himself, unaware he had just devoured his own daughter. The man walked outside, proud of his deed.
————————————-
Meanwhile, Jasmine was cuddling with a shrunken Ollie. They were pretty happy, unaware of what just happened. Jasmine smiled and went to kiss her boyfriend. When she tried though, Ollie suddenly tightened up. He fell to his hands and knees as if he was panicked.

“Ollie? What’s wrong?” Jasmine asked.

“It’s Sandra and the others. Something bad happened, I can feel it. I don’t know what happened but you need to bring them back.” Ollie responded. Jasmine nodded and did what he said without question. Using the magic ring, she wished for them all to appear in front of her alive.
111121211221111221312213112.title: A Horrible Way to Die By A Loved One

choices: She pulls herself free and escapes
Max returns while she's still alive
11112121122111122131221312.content:
Max smiled wickedly as he carried his two remaining bugs towards the freezer. He opened up the freezer and rifled around for a bit, looking past the ice trays, he found what he was looking for: an ice tray shaped like a popsicle.

"What's he doing mom?" Jon asked nervously, terrified of what would become of him.

Sandra had an idea of what he was doing but decided to lie to reassure her son. "I have no idea sweetie," she sniffled.

They watched in nervous tension as Max grabbed a bottle of grape juice and filled the mold of the popsicle. "Now for the secret ingredient," he laughed, plucking up his daughger.

"Daddy, please don't!" cried Sandra. "It's me, I'm not a bug!"

Max couldn't be bothered by this and smiled, dropping his tiny daughter into the mold. "I'll be back soon," he said, placing her in the freezer.

Max glanced down at Jon and simply placed him in his pocket. "And I'll check on you later," he laughed.

In the freezer, Sandra was in survival mold. She was constantly trying to pull herself out of the mold and avoid being part of the snack, however the icy walls were just too slick. Trying to stay conscious, what happens to Sandra?
11112121122111122131221312.title: Frozen treats

choices: Give the bug to his wife
Torture the bug by taking a bath with it
111121211221111221312213122.content:
Even though the odds were against her, Sandra kept struggling. She was getting weak and starting to lose conscience though. The image of Megan and Blake lifeless on a plate had burned into her memory, she didn’t want to share a similar fate.

“I can’t…I…won’t. I refuse… to die…this…way. Must…stay…” Sandra tried to say to herself. However, she couldn’t stop it and eventually passed out. Her lifeless body soon stopped moving externally and internally.
————————————
Max had gone outside to talk to someone. After a little bit though, he started to feel a little hungry and decided to have his treat. He went inside walked up to the freezer. He could tell his daughter’s nephew and girlfriend were in the bedroom, doing who knows what, but he simply ignored it. They weren’t going to bug him.

He pulled out his treat and went to sit down on the couch. He could tell that the “bug” was no longer alive. Part of him wanted it to be alive so he could feel it struggle. He decided to pull out the other bug that was still in his pocket. Max lifted it up to his treat so it had a good look.

Jon was horrified. His mother looked bad, and there was no light in her eyes. Jon didn’t struggle, he could only stare.

“How do you like the view? I hope it’s nice because you get to watch me eat your friend.” Max said, grinning. He started to lick and suck on his treat. Jon didn’t know what was worse, the fact that he was tasting his own daughter, or the fact that he was tasting a corpse. Jon’s eyes were glued onto the situation the entire time. Max savored his dessert until he felt the body come loose and fall onto his tongue. Once it did that, he opened his mouth wide to show the bug its friend.

“Mom.” Jon could only say looking at her. His grandpa closed his mouth and swallowed, sending what was left of Sandra down to his stomach.

“Mm, tasty. Now what should I do with you? I bet you want to join your friends in my gut. Maybe I should just turn you into ash.” Max said. Jon wasn’t affected by his words, he was to hurt already. “Hm, I have an idea.”

Max decided to…
111121211221111221312213122.title: One more bug left in the hands of the giant

choices: Audrey decided to step on him
Audrey decided to crush him between her breasts
Audrey decided to crush him between her fingers
Audrey changed her mind and quietly opened the window, setting him outside
Audrey noticed his movements and realized he was more than just a bug
1111212112211112213122131221.content:
The giant smiled as he thought about his wife, Audrey. She was 2 years younger than him with short curly silver hair and brown eyes. He knew she loved killing bugs just as much as him so she was a perfect option.

It didn’t take long to find her as she was just coming out of the bathroom. Max gave her a kiss, still keeping his smile, causing her to chuckle.

“So honey, what are you smiling about?” She asked. Audrey didn’t always agree with Max, but she loved seeing a smile on his face. Her husband held up his hand, containing the shrunken boy. The woman hesitated before giving him a kiss. “Found another victim?”

“Actually, I found 4 but I wanted you to deal with the last one.” Max said. His wife chuckled before grabbing Jon. Her hand felt soft and warm but it only terrified the boy even more.

“Thank you, I’ll take care of him right away.” She said. Max watched as she entered Jon and Blake’s bedroom to deal with the “pest”. Once Audrey was alone with her prey, she locked the door and sat on one of the beds. Jon shut his eyes and trembled, scared of what was going to come.

However, he suddenly felt something he didn’t expect: comfort. He slowly opened his eyes and noticed his grandma was softly rubbing his back. She had a sad look on her face, confusing him.

“I’m sorry little guy…for all the trouble you were put through. My husband, he hates bugs so much. It’s even worse when I think about how he taught my daughter to hate bugs as well. I won’t torture you though, don’t you worry.” She said softly.

Jon started to feel a little bit better. He didn’t know his grandma was like this. He had just assumed she was as bad as his own mother. The giantess lifted him up and gave him a soft kiss.

“I’m going to put you out of your misery but I won’t torture you.” She said. As Audrey thought about how, Jon stood up. He wondered if it was possible to get her attention. He started to wave his arms wildly, hoping she would notice.

Eventually…
1111212112211112213122131221.title: A cruel husband, a forgiving wife

111121211221111221312213123.content:
As Sandra was doing all she could to stay alive, she gradually felt the liquid around her begin to turn solid. The purple fluid had turned to sludge, and then eventually turned into a solid. Sandra, however, had managed to stay alive, she was just completely stuck, partially sticking out of the popsicle.

The freezer door eventually opened up, flooding the freezer with light. Though Sandra prayed it would be the face of Jasmine she saw, she looked on in horror as it was the returning face of Max, her dad. "Well, my snack looks about ready," Max laughed, pulling the popsicle stick out from the mold.

As he looked at his tasty grape treat, Max smiled as he saw the "bug" struggling, not dead yet. "Awwww, you're still alive. I guess my mouth will warm you up."

Sandra could not even scream at this point, she was suffering from severe hypothermia.

Does Max eat the popsicle or does he give it to someone else?
111121211221111221312213123.title: Max returns while she's still alive

11112121122111122131221313.content:
Max grinned down at his two remaining shrunken victims. It was almost as if they were cowering in the palm of his hand. He felt more powerful than he ever had before, and it was a feeling he loved.

"Alright little guys," he said, with a commanding presence in his voice. "I'm a hunter, and you are my prey. You have thirty seconds to run."

Max said this as a joke, and didn't think anything of this as they started running as soon as he set them on the ground.

"Lets see how they do," he thought to himself and chuckled.

--

"C'mon Jon, keep running," Sandra screamed, holding her son's arms, trying to pull him along with her.

Jon didn't dare question her, he just kept running, almost as if his life depended on it....and it kind of did.

As they were running past the bathroom door, Sandra spotted the spare bedroom. The door was closed and the light was on. Odds were that Jasmine and Ollie were having their fun together in that room. "I hope they're having more fun than us," Sandra thought to herself.

As she heard her father's approaching footsteps, Sandra stopped and turned to her son. "Jon, get in that room, get to Jasmine and have her fix all this," Sandra said, giving him a hug.

"What're you gonna do?" he asked nervously.

"I'm gonna distract him."

Jon did not need to be told twice, he sprinted towards the opening at the bottom of the door. He didn't know what Jasmine and Ollie were doing, but he knew it couldn't be more terrifying than this.

Meanwhile, Sandra had started to run towards the bathroom, hoping Max would follow her.

Max continued to stomp down the hallway, reaching the crossroads. On his left, one bug was running into the bathroom, on his right, thenother was approaching the crack under the spare bedroom door.

"Nice strategy," he said to himself. Max proceeded to go for...
11112121122111122131221313.title: Cat and mouse

choices: Max finishes and let’s his prisoner get taken down the shower drain
Max finishes and decides to flush his prisoner down the toilet
111121211221111221312213131.content:
Max decided to get the one going for the bathroom, ignoring the other for now. Sandra looked behind her to see her father smiling at her. She was glad that that his attention was on her and not Jon, but she was scared because she knew he was going to kill her. She ran into the bathroom with the giant behind her. Before she knew it, he had grabbed her and brought her up to his face.

“Congratulations on saving your friend. However, it won’t save you.” He said, bringing her over to the sink. Sandra screamed as she was brought under the hand soap bottle. Max simply hummed as he covered her in soap. He then blasted her with cold running water. Once he was done, she coughed, having trouble breathing. “I just wanted to make sure you where clean before we get to the real activity.”

Sandra was confused until he started running water in the shower. She was helpless as she watched her father strip down. Max stepped in and started his shower, making sure his prisoner got to experience the worst places on his body. The tiny woman cried as she was rubbed on her father. She was just glad that Jon didn’t have to experience this.
111121211221111221312213131.title: A terrible father/daughter moment together

choices: Take a closer look at her
Drop her in the front of his pants
1111212112211112213122132.content:
Looking around the kitchen, Max's eyes landed on the blender. An evil idea crept its way into Max's mind. He walked over to the counter and plugged in the blender. As he did this, Sandra caught on and began to scream and beg.

"Dad don't do this! We're not bugs!" she screamed in horror.

Obviously Max could not hear her. He was laser focused on his task. He smiled wickedly down at at Megan and Blake. "YOU BUGS SHOULD KNOW TO AVOID GIANTS LIKE ME," he said ominously. He could not be bothered to listen to his grandkids terrified cries. He held his hand over the blender and dropped Blake in.

Blake fell and hit the bottom of the blender with a tiny thud. He screamed as he saw what his grandpa was reaching for. The on button.

Sandra was crying now. She didn't care if the ring could bring them back, she honestly couldn't think about that right now.

Max reached down and pressed the button for the highest setting. Blakes tiny body was instantly town apart by the blades. Not satisfied, Max dangled a screaming and crying Megan over the pit of death before dropping her in.

Sandra just rocked back and forth in the palm of her father's hand. Jon ran over tonhe side and vomitted.

Max turned off the blender and unplugged it. He grabbed Sandra and Jon and placed them in the sink, while plugging the train.

"Mom what's he doing?" cried Jon.

Sandra didn't answer, she was just crying hysterically.

Max then did something that could only be described humilitating and twisted. The father and grandpa then dumped the red, liquified remains of the two "bugs" onto Sandra and Jon.

The two of them cried and screamed hysterically, shell shocked at what just happened. Max then reached down and picked up Jon. "No, grandpa don't!" he screamed. "Mom help me!"

Sandra could only watch as Max tossed her son into her mouth and chewed him violently, grinding him to pieces.

"ONE TO GO," he said as he picked up his tiny daughter. "NOW WHAT TO DO WITH YOU?"

Sandra screamed as Max proceeded to do what?
1111212112211112213122132.title: The blender

choices: Max looks closer and realizes what they are, deciding to spare them… for now
Max looks closer and realizes what they are, but still sees them as enemies
Max looks closer and still thinks they’re bugs, Jasmine then grabs them and runs
1111212112211112213122133.content:
Jasmine walked into the kitchen only wearing a bra and panties. Her tiny boyfriend was currently asleep between her huge breasts. When she entered the room though, she saw someone looking pretty sinister while filling a pot of water. However, she then noticed the person was holding something in his hand, something small.

“Hello there. My name is Jasmine, I’m Ollie’s girlfriend. Who are you? And um… what exactly are you doing?” The person turned on the stove for the water.

“Hey there. My name is Max, I’m Sandra’s father. I taught her everything she needs to know about how to deal with pathetic bugs. I’m actually cooking up a couple right now, did you want to look?” Max said. Jasmine nodded a little confused and stepped forward. She saw the two bugs he was talking about, but leaned in, afraid of a suspicion she had. She suddenly realized her suspicion was correct! Those two bugs he had were Megan and Blake, and they were in water that was heating up! Jasmine quickly turned the stove off and looked at Max(who now looked a bit annoyed).

“Please! Young mustn’t hurt these bugs! Not these two, and not the ones in your hand!” Jasmine pleaded. As Sandra watched this, she was both happy and sad. It was nice that Jasmine was trying to help, but she was sad(not because she wanted to die to her father) because her father wasn’t easily persuaded when it can to bugs.
——————————
She remembered a time when she was young. She was in the backyard, playing with a cricket. Her father had suddenly appeared and captured it, telling her to follow. Her dad had placed it onto a pan and started cooking it on the stove. She tried to tell him to stop and pleaded, even asking for him to eat her instead. Her dad finished cooking it and handed it to her.

“You need to toughen up. Are you truly willing to strip down and get cooked on that pan for dinner just to save a stupid creature? Are you truly ready to get eaten and die in my belly?” Her father asked. At the time, she couldn’t answer. “That’s what I thought. You need to get stronger. Here, eat this. Perhaps it will teach you just how pathetic insects are.” Sandra tried to refuse, but her dad basically forced her to eat it. She felt guilty when it traveled down to her stomach. “You need to decide which side you’re on. You’re either on my side, or the side that gets pathetically killed.”
——————————

“Sorry to ask this, but would it be alright if I took some of my clothes off? It’s pretty warm out here.” She asked, a little embarrassed.

“It’s fine with me, just don’t take everything off, there are kids around here.” He said and walked off. Jasmine smiled and took her shirt and pants off, leaving the girl in her bikini. The sudden movement did catch Ollie off guard, but he was able to hold on.

Ollie wasn’t suicidal though, he didn’t dare move onto her plate. He knew his girlfriend enough to know she ate everything on her plate, even the tiny crumbs. Just then…

The two siblings had very little time to react between the shadow of Olivia's foot falling on them and that shadow becoming a crushing reality. They had very little time to sense the movement of the air as their cousin's foot descended on their unfortunate patch of dirt at breakneck speed. They had very little time to hear the light whistle of the air rushing between her dirt-caked toes, and they had very little time to avoid said toes ramming into them without forgiveness, very little time before Olivia put her full weight into her stride and her tanned flesh sank slightly into the dirt and left a shallow impression. They had very little time until every bone in their body would be broken and shattered into innumerable fragments, very little time until every blood vessel and structure would be burst and their tiny beings would be reduced to paste, very little time before they would be reduced to tiny, indistinguishable red stains in one or two of those shallow impressions, very little time before they would join Jon -- they had very little time before they would die.

They certainly used it well.

Call it intuition, fortune, fate, luck, providence, or something else, but Blake had turned around enough to see the behemoth and tackled his older sister, safely sending them both out of harm's way. There was just enough time for them to draw in a gasping breath before Olivia's foot slammed down right where they had been. As the giantess shuddered at the sudden sensation of loam in between her bare toes instead of grass and she retracted her foot, the bug-sized children ran for the cover of the grass. Though they had avoided being squished under their cousin's foot, they were still in the area between her legs, and Olivia still had to retrieve her sandal.

Meanwhile, Olivia, who did not enjoy the feeling of the dirt under the rosebush, took a couple steps back and eyed her entangled footwear. It would be difficult to retrieve it without getting pricked, she decided. And so she re-approached the bush slowly and fell into a crouch. She was so focused on the problem at hand that she did not notice two tiny bugs ducking and weaving through the grass blades. Megan and Blake were hoping to run between Olivia's bent legs and out into the yard, where they might have a better chance at survival. They had made it to a small depression where Olivia's butt was hovering when the enormous cousin pricked her finger and lost her balance, toppling backwards...

WHAM!

The two siblings were suddenly millimeters away from Olivia's shorts, which covered the entire depression.

"What do we do now?" asked Blake.

Megan pointed at the denim canopy. "Look! We can just climb into her back pocket and we'll be safe!"

And so the two quickly struggled into Olivia's shorts pocket and huddled together, finally (if temporarily) safe. Olivia's butt -- with tiny stowaways -- lifted up as she sheepishly pulled herself out of the dip in the ground. For the tiny siblings, gravity turned sideways and they were trapped at the very bottom of the pocket, meaning they were unable to escape should they need to leave. Olivia, meanwhile, quickly retrieved her sandal, and was putting it on when a drop of sweat came down her nose and she realized that it was going to be one of those summer days -- the blisteringly hot ones. Not to be deterred, however, she sauntered into the house, grabbed a washcloth from the bathroom, and jammed it in her back pocket -- the one with the twins, who quickly got between her butt and the washcloth, hoping it might cushion the inevitable sitting. But as Olivia walked back outside, she was hit with a wall of heat, and began to sweat once more as she made her way to the bench. But did she need to use the washcloth before she plopped down?
