Blake opened his eyes the last thing he remembered was trying to climb Olivia then he blacked out. As his eyes came in to focus he saw his cousin still towering above him with her normal evil grin on her face.

Blake couldn’t help but think of how many times he'd laughed at that face as Olivia tortured defenseless bugs "karma's a bitch" he muttered under his breath then screamed as Olivia’s slightly pale bare foot lifted over him the grass and dirt stuck to the bottom of it falling all around him as she wiggled her toes in anticipation. Blake knew he was doomed, that thing was as long as a football field and he was no running back.

The sound of Olivia's voice was almost deafening to him "Bye Bye Bug" her foot started to lower
111221212211.title: Bye Bye Bug

choices: To the ground at his mother's feet
To his mother's tacky toe nails
1112212122111.content:
Blake laid wide-eyed as the colossal flesh ceiling began to lower towards him. He couldn't believe his cousin was about to grind his puny body into the dirt, mistaking him for just another pesky bug.

Olivia's foot was about 12 inches off the ground at this point, the cold, dirty, damp sole right above him.

"I gotta get out of here QUICK!" Blake said to himself. He looked around and saw a smooth stone to his right, approx. 15 ft away from his perspective, that appeared to have a slight gap under it just big enough for him to squeeze under. He quickly darts off towards the stone, looking up to see the foot is now only 6 inches away.

"Oooo, I cannot WAIT to feel your tiny bug body crunch under my foot!," Olivia bellows, "I'm gonna smear you all over it!"

Blake takes a dive under the stone. Just as he gets under and turns around to look out, everything goes totally dark and all other sounds cancel out, all he hears is the mushing and shifting of Olivia's foot as it twists and sinks in the soft, moist ground. The stone is also pressed down by her foot a little, closing the gap that Blake crawled in through. He didn't realize it had sunk until she lifted her foot.

Olivia pulled her foot back, expecting to see a pile of slimy bug guts all over, but instead just her large foot imprint in the dirt. Even looking at the bottom of her foot, she saw nothing but dirt.

"What the fuck?" she Questioned herself, kind of loudly.

Sandra heard her and came running over barefoot. "What's the matter Olivia? Can't get your flip flop?"

"Oh..no aunt Sandra, I'm fine, just trying to squash a little bug that somehow vanished!" Olivia said pointing at the imprint, "It was laying right here next to this....rock. Hmm, that rock..."

Sandra laughed and said, "You know, Olivia. I also fancy crushing bugs with my bare feet. Feeling their guts squish out all over the place, popping one by one, it is kind of like lotion.

Olivia was a little surprised that her aunt enjoys the same feeling as herself. "Wow aunt Sandra, I didn't know you liked that stuff! Do you want to help me find the bug? Hmm, maybe I should check under this."

"Oh, I would love too!" Sandra said.

Meanwhile, Blake was clawing at the dirt a little bit, trying to let light in. He could hear their conversation and became frightened! He was about to go through hell once more. Fortunately the light that shined in was enought to let him look around. He noticed a small crevice in the rock that may just save his life one more time.

Just then, Olivia and Sandra both knelt down over the rock, Olivia's hand grabbing for it. Blake hurried and climbed into the crevice in the rock just as she picked it up and glared underneath it, holding the rock sort of in front of her above the ground.

It was like a roller coaster to Blake, with in milliseconds he was lifted miles (from his perspective) into the air. Looking down, he saw the blue painted toes of his cousin and the freshly painted pink toes of his mother. He could smell the polish and knew his mom had just got done painting them, so they were probably wet still.

"Damn it, I wonder where that little bug could have gone." Olivia sighed, "I was really looking forward to crushing it. Well, maybe I'll find another one after I get my flip flop."

Olivia got to her feet and tossed the rock down in front Sandra, tossing Blake...
1112212122111.title: Blake's Escape

choices: Blake makes a break for it
Blake excepts his fate under his mother's toes
11122121221112.content:
Blake was launched from the rock as Olivia tossed it aside. All he saw was the ground coming at him quickly, until his mother shifted her foot forward. "OH NO!" Blake yelled, closing his eyes.

*SMACK*

Blake had the wind knocked out of him as he slammed down with a sticky smack. After nearly passing out, he opened his eyes and carefully looked around. He couldn't see much more than pink at the moment, his vision was a bit blurry still. He then tried to roll over and sit up, but he couldn't move, he was stuck. Then it dawned on him.

"Oh man, I'm stuck on my mother's big toe," Blake sighed, "Hmm, If I can manage to roll over I may have a chance of getting her attention."

Just then he felt himself being lifted into the air at high speed. He turned his head up to see his mother starting to head back over to the patio. Fortunately, he didn't have to hold on because he was stuck in her nail polish, which was still a bit tacky.

Sandra sat down in the lawn chair at the edge of the patio and had a sip of her iced tea as she rubbed her feet in the moist grass. She just loved the feeling when the grass slightly tickled her toes. She would occasionally wiggle them around, making rolling over that more difficult for her son, his whereabouts unknown to his giantess mother.

Blake was having a hell of a time trying to adjust himself. The pink polish was finally starting to dry, gluing his clothes to the enormous nail. After tugging hard and ripping them up a bit, he broke free and was able to roll over and sit. He noticed Olivia walking back over, her sandal in her hand. "Ugh, I hope Meg is ok," he muttered to himself, "I hope I can get mom's attention..."

Blake looked up to the sky trying to find his mother's face. He couldn't see her though, for her long toned mountainous legs were blocking his view. He tried yelling, "MOM!?.. ..MOMMY!??.....MOM, IT'S BLAKE, PLEASE HELP ME! I'M DOWN HERE, ON YOUR RIGHT BIG TOE!! MOMMY?! MOO...

Blake's cries were overtaken by an even louder voice, which seemed to have crept up from behind him. It was Olivia, returning to sit down in the grass next to Sandra, letting out a loud sigh as she plopped down. She tossed both of her sandals right next to the chair Sandra was sitting in.

"So what do you think of my toenails? Aren't they beautiful?" Sandra asked Olivia as she lifted her feet a little bit and pointed them out.

"Oooh, they are amazing!" Olivia gasped, "Very nicely done too! May I take a closer look Aunt Sandra?"

"Of course dear," Sandra said, placing her right foot on Olivia's lap.

Meanwhile, Blake felt like he was once again on a roller coaster. When his mother's giant foot came to rest on Olivia's lap, he knew he was saved, or so he thought. With a big smile on his face, he began waving his arms and calling for her. "Olivia...OLIVIA!..I'M RIGHT HERE! IT'S ME, BLAKE!...CAN YOU HEAR ME?..."

Olivia held Sandra's foot closer to her face, admiring the perfectly trimmed and polished nails.

"Oh my gosh!" Olivia giggled, "Guess what I have found on your big toe nail Aunt Sandra?"

"What is it?" Sandra questioned.

"Our little bug friend from the bushes some how made it's way onto your big toe and got stuck in the polish while it was still a little wet! Haha, silly little bug. Want me to get it off for you? Olivia asked.

"Sure go ahead Olivia," said Sandra, "Be careful not to squish him just yet, I got something planned for this guy, I'm gonna go wash my feet off, I will be right back."

Blake was terrified as Olivia's hand came down and pulled him out of the polish. Just when he thought he was saved, Olivia still thinks he is just a puny bug. "Okay, I got it!" Olivia said excitedly.

Sandra got up and went over to the hose laying on the ground to rinse off her feet. After rinsing them, she sat back down in her seat and used her towel to dry them. Then, she proceeded to apply a good bit of coconut scented lotion to her feet, making sure to get every crack in between her beautiful toes. Olivia gave the bug (Blake) to her Aunt Sandra to do as she pleased.

Blake, who was scared half to death and crying, looked up into his mothers eyes as she brought him close to her pretty face. She eyed him up and down.

"You are a very interesting looking specimen," she said, "Quite unique color..." She paused for a moment, then grinned an evil grin. "You know...little bug, you ruined my nail polish that spent soo much time doing. So, unfortunately, I can't let you walk free from this one, if you know what I mean."

Blakes heart was shattered! He couldn't believe that his own mother has mistaken him for a bug, even after looking at him so closely. And what she going to do to him, she wasn't going to let him go...then he remembered what his mother and Olivia discussed earlier about squishing bugs for fun.....his heart sank.

Sandra leaned forward and placed Blake, who she had so unfortunately mistaken for a worthless bug, down on the towel that she had been resting her feet. Blake watched as her massive sexy toes flexed up and down. He knew he would soon be placed unwillingly underneath them, and he would probably get stuck to them because of the lotion. Sandra tipped her right foot up high above Blake and curled her toes.

She called down to him, "So little bug, how is the view down there? Do you enjoy seeing my foot hovering above your puny little body!? I moisturized them just for you. Who knows, maybe you will be lucky enough to slide up in a wrinkle and avoid an instant squish!"

Blake couldn't take it, he had no time to think, it was either run for his life or face death!
11122121221112.title: A Sticky Situation

111221212211121.content:
Olivia watched as Sandra threatened the small bug with her beautiful pedicure toes. It was a nice picture. In her opinion, the bugwas lucky to be crushed under such beautiful feet.
Yes Sandra hat really well cared feet...
When the little bug tried to escape, she grabbed him and picked him up quickly.

Blake was not fast enough. The giant fingers of her cousin clutched his body faster than he could realize. The pressure hurt when he was pressed into the skin of her grooved fingers.

"He's trying to escape." Said Olivia. "But I got him. The nail polish is still sticky ... "She grinned.
"Thank you. Please put him back to the ground, so I can crush it... nice and slowly. You can watch if you like. "

Olivia thought about what she would prefer to do. Watch as her aunt Sandra slowly crushes the little bugs under her beautiful feet.... or crush the bug herself and feel how his body cracks and his organs spread over her sole...
111221212211121.title: Blake makes a break for it

choices: Yes. Lets squish him between our soles
No. She rather like to watch Olivia squasching the bug
1112212122111212.content:
She suddenly had an idea ...

"Auntie Sandra ... we could crush the tiny weed... together ... "
Sandra laughed. "How ? If I crush him flat... There will be no remains. Just some tiny mud."

"Wait a minute." Said Olivia and angled her leg so that her foot was pointing towards Sandra.
Then she pressed the insetc with her fingers against her own sole.

Blake still turned in pain, but the pressure was too strong. He could not break free from the grip of his cousin. If only she knew ....

He could barely breathe. He could only muffly hear the voices of the two talking giantesses.
Then suddenly the pressure decreased.
And around him it was bright again. With his now blurry view he tried to perceive his environment. He firmly stuck.... to Olivia's foot!
The nail polish was still tacky enough to hold him in the position of her footpad.
Now he could hear the voices of the giantesses more clearly. With a booming voice Sandra said: "AH now I see ..."

She stretched out her leg so that her foot stopped right in front of Blakes tiny body. It was like two enourmous houses of flesh rose on every of his sides. Walls of wrinkled skin.

"You want to crush the tiny thing between both of our soles. Interesting idea. This is something new .... "

Blake could not believe his ears! They would crush him. And it would also make them fun! He wanted to free himself, but he was stuck ....

Does Sandra like the idea?
1112212122111212.title: Crusching the bug TOGETHER

11122121221112121.content:
Sandra loves the idea.

Olivia smiled as she stretched out her own leg to touch Olivia's sole. The feet of the two women lightly touched.

Blake saw the wall of wrinkled skin coming closer. He could not grasp that it was his mother's sole that was about to crush him to pulp!
Her bare sole looked so huge and gentle at the same time ... perhaps due to the cream she had just used minutes before.
Then it touched him gently. He was softly squished between the soles... and around him it was dark again...

Two odors mingled. The cream from his mother on this side and the sweat of his cousin on the other side. All mixed with the smell of flattened grass.

He had to do something. He could not just give up ato be crushed like that!
He moved and tried to free himself. Fought against the enormous pressure.

"Hey, I like that," Sandra said amused. "I can feel him struggle."

"But not for long." Said Olivia, and pressed her sole with more pressure against Sandras Sole. The feeling was amazing.

"I wonder what the bug is thinking?" Olivia laughed loudly and Sandra smiled.

Blake nearly faded unconscious. But still he was alive. It was as if he was sandwiched between two wet mattresses.

Can he survive?
11122121221112121.title: Yes. Lets squish him between our soles

111221212211121212.content:
Blake was lucky. His body was so small that he was not crushed! He was just simply pushed into the soft skin of the two giantesses soles.
He had much pain to endure could hardly breathe, but he was not injured at all.

"Do you think he is flattened already?" Olivia asked.
Sandra was about to reply when she heard an unfamiliar voice.
It was Ling, Samuel's wife. The two were married for a short time now... and today was the first opportunity to get to know the Chinese woman.

"What are you doing?" Ling asked, amused. "Is this some kind of yoga... or something?" She grinned.

"You have to be Ling.... i guess." Sandra said as she looked at the little Chinese woman. She was small, but beautifull. She was wearing a yellow T-shirt plus a matching black shorts.

"Exactly. Samuel will come a little later. He just wanted to buy something to drink. You are Sandra and ... "

"Oliva." she introduced herself.

"Hello Olivia. And what are you doing there?" She asked, still smiling.
Somewhat ashamed Olivia said: "We are trying to crush a small cheeky bug."

"And for this you need both of your feet?" She grinned even more.

"Well, we thought it would be more fun this way."

Ling bent down and examined the two womens feet. "Looks nice. You got some beautiful feet. The bug is a lucky one i guess. "She said as she noticed a sparkling object on the ground.

"Hey what's that?"

Sandra leaned forward to get a better look of the object. This movement of her lowered the pressure of her foot.

Blakes environment got slowly brighter... and the pressure subsided. Fortunately! He took a deep breath. Enjoyed the fresh air.
His whole body was drenched with sweat and creme. He tasted it even on his tongue. He felt that he no longer clung so much and ...
Then his body slid slowly down Olivia's giant sweaty sole.

"Hey, that tickles." Ee heared her laughing voice booming...

Finally he reached the ground. Unbruised!

What should he do now?
111221212211121212.title: He survives somehow

1112212122111212121.content:
He decided to run. When he realized that there was a third giantess present... It was already too late. The huge foot of the unknown giantess had already slipped out of her pink flip-flop and was placed tight above him.
"He tries to escape .." he heard Olivias voice.
"I got him." Ling said more casually. She stood up already and inspects the ring in her hands while she put her foot onto the little being.

Blake stood in a shadow. Knowing what this means. The bare sole of the Chinese woman lowered slowly onto him. Impressive as an airship. The many folds made her sole even more beautiful. She was beautiful but also extremely menacing.
Blake looked away and tried to continue to run, but was already pushed gently from the balls of her foot to the ground.
The floor was definitely harder! It hurt. If the giantess just pressed a little more, his body would burst!

"Don’t worry. I did not crush him. I just pin him down to spare him for you. I don’t want to spoil the fun."
She further examined the ring, as Sandra got up and came to her. "This is the ring the children had. It is supposed to fulfill wishes ... " she said with a grin. "I should not give something valuable to the children... They let it just lie here. "

"He grant wishes?" Ling asked curiously.
"Yes, that's just a rumor. Every family has their legends... Don’t they? "Explained Sandra.

Olivia was still sitting on the floor, staring at Lings feet. "What do we do now?" She asked somewhat bored. "We have still some time until the others arrive."
1112212122111212121.title: RUN for his life

11122121221112121211.content:
"I would like to join your game. May I also crush some bugs? "

"Yes. Good idea." Sandra smiled. "Olivia and me like to crush small insects. But except for a few ants and that weed under your foot I have not seen many insects today. "

Ling smiled. "In this case we should try this ring." She joked.
She lifted her foot slightly and revealed a view of the small insect like kid beneath it. He was still alive.

For Blake, the day was a big torture! He could hardly breath any longer as the pressure slightly decreased. When the foot is lifted, his body was released from the sweaty soft sole.
He tried to get to his feet but was in so much pain that he could barely stand up.
He wondered where his sister was.
Megan.... Hopefully she was fine.

He turned onto his back. As he layed there he could see the cute face through between the toes of the giantess. She was Asian. And apparently, she pointed her finger right down at him. WITH THE RING!
"Ring, I wish there are many more such bugs."
11122121221112121211.title: Go for bug hunting

choices: They use the ring to grow themselfes
111221212211121212111.content:
Blake flinches when he is suddenly surrounded by other children!
Appearing out of nowhere. Despite his pain, he comes back to his feet. And actually, as far as he can see... he was surrounded by other children. Some he even knew from school. Others he had never seen before.

"Oh no." He thought ... "The ring strikes one more time..."
How should he find his sister again in this chaotic situation? How should they get the ring ....

"It works!" said Ling suprised.
"Wow." Olivia quickly stood up and wiped some insects off her butt. "That's crazy."
Sandra looked down. The whole floor seemed littered with these strange bugs.

Sandra was also totally surprised: "I always thought this was just such a silly story."
She took a step forward ....

Blake ran ... He ran as fast as he could... and waved his arms. "Fast! Get out of there! Quick!” He yelled with all his strength. Waved to the other children, but his mothers enormous foot was faster.
There was a smacking sound when her foot touched down heavily. Blake closed his eyes and when he opened them again he was again in front of his mother's beautiful french pedicured toes.
His mother ... She was so huge and had no idea what she had just done!

He looked around. Most of the children were still confused. Some were crying. Others already ran and fled before the giantesses.

"Hey feels good." Sandra said with a grin.
Ling also now let fall again sole of her foot, crushing dozens of insect-like-children.
"Yes. Funny game. "
Olivia held out her hand, "Nice to make your acquaintance. Now we're three with the same hobby."
111221212211121212111.title: More children-bugs appear

1112212122111212121111.content:
"Hey, we should celebrate!" Sandra said, raising a glass of wine from the table.
"This is a truly exceptional situation and we should just have some fun together... until the others arrive."
She took a sip from the glass and let her foot sink back on some insects.

"Well said” Olivia said while watching hundreds of bugs fleeing into the grass. But there were so many on the ground. We have enough to crush. This was certain.

Ling walked carelessly to a chair trampling many insects with each step and sat down. She had no idea that there were children who died under her foot.
She sat in on the chair and looking at the bustle at her feet.
Sandra also sat down in the chair next to her new asian friend.
Olivia, however, remained standing as if she was paralyzed.


Blake had to do something! He knew that. He had to somehow save his sister.... and then they had to explain the giantesses that they were no insects! They need to know there are just ant-sized children ant their feet!

Maybe it was even quite good that there have been so many of them by now. If the giantesses were busy to crush other children, he might be able to escape unnoticed... and get a chance to look for his sister.
But how?
How could he only see her in the masses of children?

He ran off and called for her: "Megan! Megan! Where are you? "
He was in turmoil, exactly between the giantesses. As he ran, he looked up. Saw his cousin grinned mischievously. She lifted her foot and pointed her big toe down.
While She brushed her hair back she slowy lowere her toe...
Blake looked around and noticed a little crying girl sitting in her shadow... He could do nothing right?

He went on running... watched as his cousins big toe fell down at the tiny girl. But he could not do anything. He just had no time and power to save her. And he could not take the risk to get crushed. Not from his beautifull cousin!

Then he had to watch it. Olivia giggled loudly as the body of the girl burst into the fleshy grooves of her big toe.

Blake ran on....
1112212122111212121111.title: They enjoy some crushing

11122121221112121211111.content:
Blake ran like his life depended on it (it did). His giantess of a cousin, Olivia was having the time of her life crushing dozens of the ant sized children she had mistaken as insects. Not only that, but as soon as Sandra and Ling refilled their drinks, they could return soon too.

That said, Blake knew that his best opportunity to escape was right now. He desperately wanted to find Megan and make sure she was safe, but he knew he could not do that if he had been crushed.

Most of the bug children were avoiding the bushes, probably because they were afraid of what may be lurking in them. Blake, however, knew this bushes were almost 100 percent insect free due to his mom's toxic chemicals.

Reaching the bushes, Blake felt that he was far enough from the danger that he could take a break. What frightened him, was that he knew he would likely need to go back to get the attention of either his mom or of Olivia. He still had no idea how he would do that.

Watching the horror unfold before him, it looked like Olivia was starting to lose interest in the big crushing. Her beautiful bare feet with littered with splotches of red, which if you took a closer look at may even reveal some human body parts.

Taking a deep breath, Blake prepared to face his fears. Before he did so, he noticed a small group of big sized kids further off in the yard. Maybe there was a chance Megan was with them, or at least maybe they knew where she was.

What does Blake decide to do?
11122121221112121211111.title: He escapes the three Giantesses

choices: Show her aunt Sandra and Ling
11122121221112121211112.content:
In a panic, Blake continued to call for his sister Megan. He knew she had to be among the bug-sized kids somewhere. Blake had his head on a swivel as he attempted to look through all the panicking children. Several of the children had the smart idea to get off of the concrete and enter the grass jungle where they were less likely to be seen.

High up above the chaos taking place at her feet, Olivia cracked a smile. She felt so powerful having all these tiny bugs at her well-pedicured feet. She took a sip of her wine glass. She had no idea what type of bugs these were, maybe ants or something. She did know that they were fun to crush. Looking over her shoulder, she could see her aunt Sandra and in-law Ling laughing sitting on the chairs together. It looked like they were taking a break from crushing the insects.

Blake had reached the edge of the grass when he thought he heard a familiar voice calling for help. Thinking it was Megan he turned around. To his dismay, it was some random girl about his own age calling for help. Blake attempted to rush to her aid, but saw a massive shadow coming towards him. Looking up, he could see Olivia's massive hand reaching down for the screaming girl.

Olivia lifted what she thought was a tiny bug between two fingers. She obviously could not hear the little girl screaming for help. As the little girl let out another scream she was squeezed too hard and burst in between Olivia's thumb and index finger. "Oops," Olivia said with a smile, and took another sip of her wine. Examining her fingers, Olivia noticed what the thought were weird appendages from the bug.

"Hmmmm, what are those?" Olivia said to herself. Glancing down, she reached for another bug. Little did she know the inset she picked up was actually her cousin Blake.

"Olivia it's me!" Blake screamed. "Help me!"

Curiously, Olivia began to examine the bug closer when her eyes widened. "What the hell?" she whispered. She needed to get a closer look at this bug or something. Olivia proceeded to do what?
11122121221112121211112.title: Something stops him

choices: She makes the wish, and shrinks too
111221212211121212111121.content:
Olivia is very curious as this is a very unique looking bug. She had absolutely no idea what it was and wanted to get a closer look at it. Little did she know but the tiny "insect" in her hand was actually her tiny cousin, Blake.

Entering the house, Olivia began rummaging through drawers looking for a magnifying glass. Having no luck, she saw her Aunt Sandra standing in the kitchen.

"Hey Aunt Sandy," she said cheerfully. "Do you guys have a magnifying glass around here?"

"We sure do," Sandra said, opening a drawer Olivia hadn't gotten to yet. "What do you need one for?"

Olivia blushed as she knew it was gonna sound weird. "Well you know those bugs we were stepping on outside?"

"Yeah"

"I thought they looked weird so I wanted to get a closer look."

Sandra just smiled. "Okay well let me know if you find anything interesting. Oh can you hold onto that ring? I'm gonna be cooking and don't want to lose it."

Sandra proceeded to give Olivia the magic ring for the time being as she walked back outside. Slipping the ring onto her finger she took the magnifying glass and the bug upstairs.

"Okay, what do we have here," she said to herself, dropping Blake onto the table and lifting up the magnifying glass. Her expression changed almost instantly. She couldn't possibly be looking at....Blake?

"Oh my god," she whispered. "Blake is that you?"

Blake tried to explain his situation but Olivia could not hear him. Olivia just had a look of pure shock stricken across her face.

Olivia realized she could not hear Blake and was about to make a wish. She thought she was gonna wish "to be able to hear Blake."
111221212211121212111121.title: Get a magnifying glass

1112212122111212121111212.content:
Olivia stared at her tiny, big sized nephew. She felt so bad for what she had put him through. Horrifying thoughts started racing through her head. She was imagining if the other tiny "ants" she had been squishing in the backyard had actually been people.

"Oh my god," Olivia said. She covered her mouth as she felt sick to her stomach. Olivia was not thinking clearly at this point. She could see Blake was trying to communicate with her but it was to no Avila, she just couldn't hear him.

Then Olivia said it. While holding the magic ring, she spoke the words, "I wish I could hear what he's saying."

The room started to spin. Olivia fired to scream but shot down in size to quickly. Then everything went black. When she came to, she was on some wooden surface, staring at her cousin, Blake.

Blake proceeded to explain everything that happen. The explanation seemed to traumatized Olivia and brought her to tears. "So I guess we have to wait for someone to get the ring and help us," Olivia said, hugging her younger cousin. She stared down from the counter and noted the location of the magic ring on the floor.

No sooner had she said that, then heavy footsteps started making their way towards the living room. Olivia and Blake stared in amazement at the enormous body of who in front of them?
1112212122111212121111212.title: She makes the wish, and shrinks too

choices: the women determine if the ring is magical
1112212122111212122.content:
Blake was shocked to see there was a third giantess present... Blake's instincts were to run......but he had hope that ling would recognize him.

Blake stood in front of the bare sole of the Chinese woman. Her titanic foot to blake was wider than a blimp. Her feet looked beautiful with her baby blue nail paint on her toes but also extremely menacing giving the fact that they were 10x bigger than him.

With the object in hand, Sandra tells ling what it is. This is the ring the children had. It is supposed to fulfill wishes ... she said with a smile. I should not have given sonething valuable to children... They let it just lie here. "

It grant wishes? Ling asked curiously. Yes, that's just a rumor. Every family has their legends and whatnot. Sandra said. Olivia was curious about this ring as well, but remember what her and Sandra were trying accomplish. Wait! Before we go into this, we still have a pest to squish. Olivia said. Oh,right. Our little bug friend. Sandra said. All three giantesses eyes land right on Blake, who is feeling unsure staying when he could have been running.

Me and Olivia were going to flatten this little insect, but now I guess we're back to square one. Sandra said. Ling was interested in Olivia and Sandra' s need to squish this pest. Ling would be lying to herself if she said she never enjoyed stomping on insects as she came across them. Ling remembers this one time when she was a preteen, she crushed a huge bug. The thing was she didn't stop crushing it. She continually kept stomping it until it was stuck to her foot and she left a deep imprint of her foot in the ground. It was the best feeling to her in the world to her back then.

Ling wanted to feel that feeling one more time. Before they could decide who gets the privilege of crushing the bug, ling quickly raised her foot and stomp down hard. Blake had no time to even acknowledge what was going on before he was turned into a red, gooey paste that ling grinds her foot on Blake's remains and adds a final stomp for good measure.

Sandra and Olivia were surprised to see ling quickly and brutally eradicate the bug. Awww, I wanted to feel its guts pop under my foot. Olivia pouts. Ling.....I didn't know you could do this. Sandra said. It just been a while since I have. I forget how good it feels to pop an insect and grind it to dust. Bling said. I believe we are going to be just fine together. Sandra said with a smile. With the ring in hand and part of Blake's guts stuck to line's sole, the ladies went to see if this ring was magical. Unbeknown to them that they bonded over Sandra's crushed son.
1112212122111212122.title: bad idea

choices: Some or all three of the women shrink
Other members at the family party shrink without them knowing
11122121221112121222.content:
The three women stood in a circle, examining the ring.

"So do you think this thing is actually supposed to be magical," asked Olivia, holding the ring in the palm of her hand, examining it.

Then her mother's tongue sloshed her around, sucking her flavor, feeling her movement across the tastebuds, and experiencing pleasure like none other. Then, after that horrible moment passed, Sandra's fate was sealed as her mother's tongue lifted up, making her slide down the throat and her pleas for mercy and help gone deaf behind her esophagus as she swallowed.

Outside, Katherine's neck bobbed as she felt the tiny morsel go down her throat, none the wiser that the morse was her daughter. When the little bulge she traced with her fingers disappeared inside her chest, she patted her belly, and sighed.

"That was a delicious little snack. I wonder if there are any more?"

Katherine loved the feeling of the tiny "bug" going down her throat and could still feel Sandra's tiny body squirming for her life in her stomach.

Like her daughter Sandra, Katherine had always hated bugs too. However, she got a bit of a power rush wen it came to killing them, especially by eating them. Making sure no one was watching, she began to look around the backyard for more victims. What does she find?

1112212122111212122212211111.content:
Katherine paused as she was about to go back inside of the house. She remembered about the third little ant, the one she had trapped in a disgusting puddle of her mucus. Since she had picked off the other two pathetic insects, Katherine decided to see what had become of the third.

Olivia was in a bad way. She had stopped sinking into her grandmothers snot, and was submerged up to her neck. Unfortunately for her, it seemed to have hardened, trapping the tiny woman.

A massive shadow cascaded across Olivia, and she turned her head as best she could to see her approaching grandma. Katherine crouched down, smiling at her handiwork, and at the trapped little “ant” down at her toes.

“AWWWW, WHERE ARE YOUR FRIENDS?” the giantess teased, licking her lips after swallowing Sandra.

Down below, Olivia was just crying. “Grandma, please help me,” the girl sobbed.

Katherine grinned down at the tiny little bug. She didn’t hear her granddaughters cries for help, but it just looked like the bug was trying to free itself.

“WELL, I THINK ILL HELP YOU,” Katherine said, though Olivia was unsure of how sincere this was.

Katherine stopped and thought for a second, and then smiled. “I KNOW WHAT ILL DO,” she said.

What does Katherine do?
1112212122111212122212211111.title: Olivia still trapped in her snot

1112212122111212122212212.content:
Katherine starred down at the three tiny creatures. She definitely thought it was weird they were trying to help out their friend, currently trapped in the giant grandmothers snot. "Hmmm....what are you guys?" Katherine says casually.

Glancing over her shoulders to make sure no one is watching, Katherine then drops down to her knees to get a closer look.

Ling and Sandra are trying desperately to free Olivia from this sticky prison. Olivia is still sobbing but they had managed to slightly pull her out enough so that she wouldn't suffocate. "Hang in their sweetie," Sandra said to her trapped niece.

"This is so gross!" screamed Olivia.

"Look out!" yelled Ling. As they saw Katherine's face getting closer and closer.

"Oh now," Sandra said with a pit in her stomach. "Not again, please mom..."

Much to their relief, they were not met with Katherine's mouth, but rather her enemies eye. She was actually inspecting these three ant sized woman.

"Oh my god," Katherine whispered. "You look like three little people." There was an awkward pause. "Are you little people?"

Ling and Sandra started yelling and doing whatever they could to confirm they were. Olivia just sat there as her grandmothers snot started to harden around her.

"Well what are you doing in my daughter's backyard?" Katherine says in a stern voice.
All three tiny women felt uneasy at her tone.

"Here," Katherine said and reached for Sandra and Ling. "Let me get a better look at you,"
1112212122111212122212212.title: They look lexactly like little.....people!

111221212211121212222.content:
Gary was taking a break from grilling. He wanted a chance to socialize with his wife and their guests at the party.

“Hey Uncle Gary, want a beer?” It was Ollie. Ollie was an athlete in his early 20’s, and was Olivia’s older brother.

“Sure thing man,” Gary said, grabbing a bottle Ollie handed him. The two talked for a bit before Gary asked, “Hey, have you seen Sandy?”

Ollie looked around the yard and nodded. “Yeah she’s over here with Olivia, let’s go.” The two men began walking over towards their wife/sister, when the unexpected happened. Suddenly in a flash, both Gary and Ollie rapidly shrank down in the backyard, now the size of ants.

“Ollie, you alright?” Gary said, running over to his nephew.

Ollie was trying to get his bearings. “Yeah, what the fuck happened? Why are we so small?”

Before Gary had a chance to even think about an answer, two giant shadows hovered over them.

“Hey Aunt Sandy, looks like the ring works!” Olivia screamed in joy. “It made two more bugs appear for us.”

Sandra laughed, not realizing that her husband and her nephew were the ones down at her and Olivia’s toes.

Gary realized how dangerous of a situation this was. “Ollie, we need to get out of here, run!” he yelled, shoving his nephew who appeared to be in a state of shock.

“Awww they’re trying to escape,” teased Olivia.

Sandra smiled and scrunched her toes. “Not if I have anything to say about that!” she laughed, and lites her foot high above the lawn.

Who does Sandra crush?

Blake layed on the towel, looking up in horror at his mother's massive, pink painted feet. She teased him - moving her foot above him so her wrinkled yet moisturized and just washed sole would hover a few feet above him. She would also tap her foot and stomp the ground next to him, causing mini earthquakes. Sandra wiggled her toes, and Blake knew he could not escape them. But he had to try.

He ran with all his speed. But then Olivia's foot landed right in front of him, blocking his path. All he saw was her blue painted nails moving at him at speeds like a race car, and he was kicked back to the center of the towel at Sandra's feet.

The women laughed at all the fun they were having. "Hehe..He tried to run! How pathetic... bad bug!" Boomed Olivia. Sandra said, "Well, they are all pretty pathetic arnt they? Hehe well little bug, it's been fun but this just will not make me forgive you for ruining my new pink polish. Say goodbye, here comes my foot!"

Of course, Sandra had to do this in the most fun - and sadistic - way she could. She first put her foot on the "bug" so that it was under her arch. Blake could smell the coconut lotion. He could feel the now smooth and wrinkled sole of his mom on him. She began to role him around under her. She removed her foot and placed her big toe on him. She tapped it up and down, hurting Blake but not enough to end it. Finally, she raised her foot and slammed down hard. STOMP. She felt the bug's guts ooze onto the bottom of her foot. She twisted it and grinder it, and spun around in place half on her tip toes now. She then grinded the remains with her heel and then put in one final stomp for good measure.

"Well, bey bey little guy! Hehe..." Sandra said. "I wish there where more... I want to try one!" Olivia said. "Well let's go look for some! I can't have all theese bugs in my yard anyhow!"
111221212211122.title: Bye Blake

She flicks Blake around with her toe until she gets bored
1112212122112.content:
Olivia's smile fell as the bug remained where it was, as if accepting its fate. Crushing them was no fun if they didn't try to escape.

She stomped her foot down right in front of the insect, hoping that the impact would scare the little critter into running. A chase would make the whole thing a great deal more fun.

Still no reaction. Little bastard, she thought. Idly, she scrunched her big toe and flicked out with it, catching the bug a glancing blow and sending it tumbling away an inch or so.

Olivia giggled despite herself. Maybe there was some other way to have fun here, at least...

info.brief_description: kids shrink during their family barbeque and have to escape their oblivious relatives
info.description:
On the 4th of July the Jones family is celebrating with their annual barbeque. They've invited most of their extended family as well. The Jones children find themselves shrunk in the backyard and must survive the movements and eating habits of their giant relatives. You can introduce new extended family characters like cousins, nephews, nieces, and aunts but keep the main characters as listed.

Just three big rules: No one sentence chapters, keep the giants unaware of the kids or have them perceived as insects, and maybe most important: before you add a chapter be aware of what happened in the prevous chapter for the sake of continuity.

Mrs. Sandra Jones - 36 years old, a towering blond at 6ft tall and in very good shape
Mr. Gary Jones - 40 years old, also in good shape

Jon - 13 years old - strong and confident, protects his younger siblings
Megan - 11 years old - shy, seeks the approval of her parents
Blake - 8 years old - curious
